content.original:
A new season of Solaris 7 is about to begin. Each season consists of two parts:

1. Solaris League in which everyone fights against everyone in single battles

2. Solaris Championship that includes top 128 pilots based on the League results


Qualification for the Championship requires you to reach sufficient level of Notoriety through league battles


To participate in a specific weight class, you will have to acquire a corresponding license.

Скоро начнется новый сезон Solaris 7. Каждый сезон состоит из двух частей:

1. Лига Соляриса, в которой каждый сражается против всех в одиночных битвах.

2. Чемпионат Соляриса, где участвуют 128 лучших пилотов по результатам Лиги.

Квалификация на чемпионат требует, чтобы вы достигли достаточного уровня известности через бои в Лиге.

Для участия в определенной весовой категории вам необходимо приобрести соответствующую лицензию.

content.content: Чемпионат штурмовых мехов: матч 3 из 7

content.original: He's big! He's mean! He's Hareton Splimby, and he's on your screen! Welcome back, arena fans! I'm comfy in my commentary bunker and we're just about to kick off the third match of {COMPANY.CompanyName} versus the world in our seasonal Assault 'Mech championship!
content.prevOriginal: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to the 1/16 of the Solaris Assault Championship! Let the fight begin!
content.content: He's big! He's mean! He's Hareton Splimby, and he's on your screen! Welcome back, arena fans! I'm comfy in my commentary bunker and we're just about to kick off the third match of {COMPANY.CompanyName} versus the world in our seasonal Assault 'Mech championship!

content.original: This match is the same rules as always, folks! Can our rising stars keep up their ascent? Let's find out!
content.prevOriginal: It's 1/16, you've got serious folks here, stay focused. Good luck!
content.content: Уважаемые зрители! Этот матч проходит по тем же правилам, что и всегда! Вопрос, сможет ли наша восходящая звезда продолжить свое восхождение? Ответ узнаем прямо сейчас!

content.original: And there goes the battle! {COMPANY.CompanyName} is pulling out all the stops here, and that's earned them an express ride to Solaris City!
content.prevOriginal: And there we go. Right into the 1/8!
content.content: And there goes the battle! {COMPANY.CompanyName} is pulling out all the stops here, and that's earned them an express ride to Solaris City!

content.original: That had to hurt! {COMPANY.CompanyName} are down and out!
content.prevOriginal: Ok, that was unfortunate. Let's try next season.
content.content: Это должно быть было больно! {COMPANY.CompanyName} падает и выбывает!

content.original: Ominous, but hardly surprising. If we take this win we'll be over halfway to the top.
content.prevOriginal: This is a play-off tournament, if you lose this battle, you are out.
content.content: Кажется, нас настраивают на серьёзный лад. Если мы одержим эту победу, то окажемся на полпути к вершине.

content.original: Defeat the opposing gladiator
content.prevOriginal: Win in a duel
content.content: Одолеть вражеского гладиатора

content.original: You've done well to get this far, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}, but it looks like the gloves are off. At this point a lot of the chaff has been discarded. Give us a good show!
content.prevOriginal: 1/16 of the Solaris Assault Championship. You have to eliminate the opponent to move to the next stage.
content.content: Вы хорошо потрудились, чтобы зайти так далеко, командир {COMMANDER.LastName}, но, похоже, сейчас все слабаки отсеялись, и каждый участник метит в чемпионы. Устройте нам хорошее шоу!

content.original: Assault Championship: Semifinal
content.prevOriginal: Assault Championship: SEMI-FINAL
content.content: Чемпионат штурмовых мехов: полуфинал

content.original: Welcome back, guys, gals, and non-binary pals! I'm your charming commentator, Hareton Splimby, and we're here at the penultimate match of the seasonal Assault 'Mech championship!
content.prevOriginal: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to the semi-final of the Solaris Assault Championship! Let the fight begin!
content.content: Welcome back, guys, gals, and non-binary pals! I'm your charming commentator, Hareton Splimby, and we're here at the penultimate match of the seasonal Assault 'Mech championship!

content.original: {COMPANY.CompanyName} has been carving a path towards the grand prize! Will this battler live up to expectations?! Get ready to find out in THREE, TWO, ONE! Start the match!!
content.prevOriginal: It's the semi-final, you will be facing the best of the best. Good luck!
content.content: {COMPANY.CompanyName} всеми правдами и неправдами прокладывал себе путь к главному призу! Оправдает ли этот мехвоин ожидания сегодня?! Приготовьтесь узнать это через ТРИ, ДВА, ОДИН! Да начнётся матч!!!

content.original: An explosive finish! With that, {COMPANY.CompanyName} makes their way into the final round! Could they be champions? Tune in next time to find out!
content.prevOriginal: And there we go. Right into the final!
content.content: An explosive finish! With that, {COMPANY.CompanyName} makes their way into the final round! Could they be champions? Tune in next time to find out!

content.original: Like Ikaros, {COMPANY.CompanyName} flew too close to the sun. And I, Hareton Splimby, playing the part of Daidalos, watch them plummet into the sea. Alas, brave MechWarriors! Next time!
content.prevOriginal: Ok, that was unfortunate. Let's try next season.
content.content: Like Ikaros, {COMPANY.CompanyName} flew too close to the sun. And I, Hareton Splimby, playing the part of Daidalos, watch them plummet into the sea. Alas, brave MechWarriors! Next time!

content.original: I think even their hype-man is starting to believe himself. We might actually have a shot here, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: This is a play-off tournament, if you lose this battle, you are out.
content.content: Мне кажется, даже их зазывала начинает в нас верить. Но, если серьёзно, у нас действительно есть шанс, командир.

content.original: Defeat the opposing semifinalist
content.prevOriginal: Win in a duel
content.content: Одолеть вражеского полуфиналиста

content.original: Two more to go, Commander! You've brought quite a storm to {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} and left hell in your wake. That's the kind of attitude we're looking for! Now get out there and crack some cockpit glass!
content.prevOriginal: Semi-final of the Solaris Assault Championship. You have to eliminate the opponent to move to the next stage.
content.content: Осталось ещё два! Ох и наделали вы шуму на {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}, устроили им ад на земле. Именно такой подход нам и нужен! А теперь - вперёд, в бой. И пусть кабины трещат!

content.original: Assault Championship: Match 2 of 7

content.content: Чемпионат штурмовых мехов: матч 2 из 7

content.original: Can they keep up the streak, or are they about to meet their maker? Let's find out in THREE, TWO, ONE!
content.prevOriginal: It's 1/32, not the most vigorous opponents usually, but stay focused. Good luck!
content.content: Can they keep up the streak, or are they about to meet their maker? Let's find out in THREE, TWO, ONE!

content.original: Another victory for {COMPANY.CompanyName}! Keep an eye on these ones, folks! I think we're about to see something truly spectacular!

content.content: Another victory for {COMPANY.CompanyName}! Keep an eye on these ones, folks! I think we're about to see something truly spectacular!

content.original: Looks like {COMPANY.CompanyName} made it out of the frying pan, but didn't survive the fire! Pack it up, folks, we're done here!
content.prevOriginal: Ok, that was unfortunate. Let's try next season.
content.content: Looks like {COMPANY.CompanyName} made it out of the frying pan, but didn't survive the fire! Pack it up, folks, we're done here!

content.original: A regular? That's a step up from a fresh face like before. They'll likely know some of the tricks of the trade, so keep your guard up.
content.prevOriginal: This is a play-off tournament, if you lose this battle, you are out.
content.content: Постоянный участник? Это на голову выше детей, что были раньше. У него наверняка будет пара козырей в рукаве, так что будьте начеку.

content.original: Defeat the opposing gladiator
content.prevOriginal: Win in a duel
content.content: Одолеть вражеского гладиатора

content.original:
Good showing so far, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}. Our early matches tend to have the lowest turnout, but don't let that dissuade you

Your next match is against one of our underdogs. They're a regular, but never seem to strike it big. Good luck!
content.prevOriginal: 1/32 of the Solaris Assault Championship. You have to eliminate the opponent to move to the next stage.
content.content:
Хорошее выступление, командир {COMMANDER.LastName}. В этих первых матчах обычно самая низкая явка, но пусть это вас не разочаровывает

Ваш следующий матч - против одного из наших аутсайдеров. Он из постоянных участников, но никогда особо не выделялся. Удачи!

content.prevOriginal: Assault Championship: 1/4

content.original: The seasonal Assault 'Mech tournament is beginning to enter its twilight hours, folks! Figuratively, of course. It's still bright and sunny down on the faux streets of the arena, and it's just as well! We've got another exciting new match coming your way!
content.prevOriginal: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to the 1/4 of the Solaris Assault Championship! Let the fight begin!
content.content: The seasonal Assault 'Mech tournament is beginning to enter its twilight hours, folks! Figuratively, of course. It's still bright and sunny down on the faux streets of the arena, and it's just as well! We've got another exciting new match coming your way!

content.original: You might be thinking "gee, isn't he all Splimbyed out?" The answer is no. I am never done Splimbying. Do not ever doubt me again.
content.prevOriginal: It's 1/4, you got League leading mechwarrior as an opponent, you have to do your best. Good luck!
content.content: You might be thinking "gee, isn't he all Splimbyed out?" The answer is no. I am never done Splimbying. Do not ever doubt me again.

content.original: Another hair-raising finish from {COMPANY.CompanyName}! Is there no stopping these titular, titanic titans?!
content.prevOriginal: And there we go. Right into the semi-final!
content.content: Another hair-raising finish from {COMPANY.CompanyName}! Is there no stopping these titular, titanic titans?!

content.prevOriginal: Ok, that was unfortunate. Let's try next season.
content.content: Ohh! I felt that from here!! {COMPANY.CompanyName} tried so hard, and got so far! But in the end, it didn't make a difference! They are OUT!

content.original: We're on the home stretch now, {COMMANDER.FirstName}.
content.prevOriginal: This is a play-off tournament, if you lose this battle, you are out.
content.content: {COMMANDER.FirstName}, мы уже на финишной прямой.

content.original: Defeat the opposing quarter-finalist
content.prevOriginal: Win in a duel
content.content: Одолеть вражеского четвертьфиналиста

content.original: For a fresh face you're blowing through expecations, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}. More of the same, so keep at it and we'll make a champion of you yet!
content.prevOriginal: 1/4 of the Solaris Assault Championship. You have to eliminate the opponent to move to the next stage.
content.content: Для нового лица вы превосходите все ожидания, командир {COMMANDER.LastName}. Продолжайте в том же духе, и мы ещё сделаем из вас чемпиона!

content.original: Assault Championship: Match 1 of 7
content.prevOriginal: Assault Championship: 1/64
content.content: Чемпионат штурмовых мехов: матч 1 из 7

content.original: Hareton Splimby coming to you live from the armoured commentary bunker! Welcome one and all to the beginning of the seasonal Assault 'Mech championship here in the Tennesee Valley! To our combatants: good luck!
content.prevOriginal: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to the 1/64 of the Solaris Assault Championship! Let the fight begin!
content.content: Hareton Splimby coming to you live from the armoured commentary bunker! Welcome one and all to the beginning of the seasonal Assault 'Mech championship here in the Tennesee Valley! To our combatants: good luck!

content.original: These early matches should be a good gauge of what we're getting ourselves into. Don't underestimate your opponent just because it's early, though; everyone starts somewhere.
content.prevOriginal: It's 1/64, not the most vigorous opponents usually, but stay focused. Good luck!
content.content: Эти первые матчи должны стать хорошим примером того, во что мы ввязываемся. Но не стоит недооценивать соперника только потому, что самое начало сетки: все с чего-то начинают.

content.original: Three! Two! One! That BattleMech is down for the count! {COMPANY.CompanyName} move through to the next round!
content.prevOriginal: And there we go. Right into the 1/32!
content.content: Три! Два! Один! Время вышло, мех повержен! {COMPANY.CompanyName} проходит в следующий раунд!

content.original: Oof, that is D.O.A! Dead On Arrival! {COMPANY.CompanyName} is out of the running!
content.prevOriginal: Ok, that was quick unfortunately. Let's try next season.
content.content: Oof, that is D.O.A! Dead On Arrival! {COMPANY.CompanyName} is out of the running!

content.original: I'm still reading through the three-hundred page legal document they sent our way, but so far it all seems reasonable. As for the arena, the Tennesse Valley used to be a wildlife reserve back in the day. Expect mud, and trees.
content.prevOriginal: This is a play-off tournament, if you lose this battle, you are out.
content.content: Я всё ещё читаю трёхсотстраничный юридический документ, который они нам прислали, но пока всё кажется разумным. Что касается арены, то «Долина Теннесси» в свое время была заповедником дикой природы. Ожидайте грязь и деревья.

content.original: Defeat the opposing gladiator
content.prevOriginal: Win in a duel
content.content: Одолеть вражеского гладиатора

content.original:
Welcome to the Solaris Seasonal Assault 'Mech Championship, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}! In case you're unfamiliar, this is a standard 64-bracket single elimination tournament. Defeat each opponent to move further up the rankings for fame, fortune, glory, and fame! Just be warned that if you lose a match, you're out. We don't faff around with losers bracket nonsense here.

For your first match, it looks like we have you penned in with some fellow newcomers in the Tennesee Valley arena. Break a leg!
content.prevOriginal: 1/64 of the Solaris Assault Championship. You have to eliminate the opponent to move to the next stage.
content.content:
Командир {COMMANDER.LastName}, добро пожаловать на Сезонный чемпионат штурмовых мехов Соляриса! Если вы ещё не в курсе, это стандартный турнир типа single elimination с сеткой на 64 участника. Побеждайте каждого соперника, продвигайтесь дальше по сетке и копите славу, удачу, известность и популярность! Только учтите, что если вы проиграете матч, вы выбываете из турнира. Мы тут сеткой лузеров не занимаемся.

Для вашего первого матча, похоже, вас определили в компанию с таким же новичком, на арену «Долина Теннесси». Ни пуха, ни пера!

content.original: Guys, gals, and non-binary pals! Hareton Splimby back once more with our next installment in the saga of {COMPANY.CompanyName}! They started from the bottom, smashed through three brutal matches, and have earned their place in Solaris City!

content.original: Can they keep up with the arena veterans, or will {COMMANDER.FirstName} {COMMANDER.LastName} be taking the next shuttle back home? Keep your eyes peeled as we begin the next match of our seasonal Assault 'Mech championship!
content.prevOriginal: It's 1/8, you've got serious folks here, stay focused. Good luck!
content.content: Can they keep up with the arena veterans, or will {COMMANDER.FirstName} {COMMANDER.LastName} be taking the next shuttle back home? Keep your eyes peeled as we begin the next match of our seasonal Assault 'Mech championship!

content.original: Bam! That worked perfectly! {COMPANY.CompanyName} pull off another victory! That's a strong entrance to the city circuit! Let's see where they go from here!
content.prevOriginal: And there we go. Right into the 1/4!
content.content: Bam! That worked perfectly! {COMPANY.CompanyName} pull off another victory! That's a strong entrance to the city circuit! Let's see where they go from here!

content.original: Whoa! {COMPANY.CompanyName} got blown away! That sure was a rude awakening to how things work in Solaris City!
content.prevOriginal: Ok, that was unfortunate. Let's try next season.
content.content: Воу! {COMPANY.CompanyName} разнесли в щепки! Это жёсткое напоминание о том, как у нас всё устроено здесь, в Солярис-Сити!

content.original: Moving into the city arena will be a big change from what we've been dealing with so far. Expect a lot of narrow sight lines and vantage points.
content.prevOriginal: This is a play-off tournament, if you lose this battle, you are out.
content.content: Городская арена сильно отличается от прошлых мест. Ожидайте много узких точек прострела.

content.original: Defeat the opposing gladiator
content.prevOriginal: Win in a duel
content.content: Одолеть вражеского гладиатора

content.original: You're over the halfway point now, Commander. You're also pulling exceptional ratings, which means you've got a one-way ticket to the Solaris City arena for the rest of your matches! Don't disappoint and you'll be rolling in cash in no time!
content.prevOriginal: 1/8 of the Solaris Assault Championship. You have to eliminate the opponent to move to the next stage.
content.content: Вы уже прошли половину пути, командир. И ваш рейтинг сейчас исключительно высокий, что означает билет эксперссом на арены Солярис-Сити на все последующие матчи! Не разочаруйте публику, и тогда скоро будете купаться в деньгах!

content.original: Assault Championship: Final
content.prevOriginal: Assault Championship: FINAL
content.content: Чемпионат штурмовых мехов: финал

content.original: Here we are folks! The Assault 'Mech championship final! I'm your host - the gracious Hareton Splimby! For those of you who live under rocks - hey, I don't judge! - we have our rising stars from {COMPANY.CompanyName}, led by the accomplished Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}.
content.prevOriginal: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to the FINAL of the Solaris Assault Championship! Let the fight begin!
content.content: Here we are folks! The Assault 'Mech championship final! I'm your host - the gracious Hareton Splimby! For those of you who live under rocks - hey, I don't judge! - we have our rising stars from {COMPANY.CompanyName}, led by the accomplished Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}.

content.original: Two 'Mechs enter, but only one can leave! Let's see which MechWarrior has what it takes to bring home the Assault 'Mech championship in THREE, TWO, ONE! Start the match!!
content.prevOriginal: It's the FINAL, Commander. You've made it this far, make every shot count. Good luck!
content.content: Два меха заходят, но только один сможет уйти! Посмотрим, кто из мехвоинов унесёт домой чемпионский титул в классе штурмовых мехов. ТРИ! ДВА! ОДИН! Матч начался!

content.original:
What a finish!! Guys, gals, and — as ever — non-binary pals, we have ourselves a new Assault 'Mech seasonal champion!

Jerry!! Get a camera drone down there, stat!

Don't go anywhere, folks! We'll be right back with an interview after a short commercial break!
content.prevOriginal: We are the champions!
content.content:
Какое завершение!!! Мальчики и девочки - перед вами новый сезонный чемпион штурмовых мехов!

(Джерри! Давай дрона с камерой туда прям сейчас!)

Не спешите уходить, господа! Мы вернемся к вам с горячим интервью после короткой рекламной паузы!

content.original: So close! And yet so far! {COMPANY.CompanyName} falls and they are not getting back up, folks!
content.prevOriginal: Ok, that was unfortunate. Let's try next season.
content.content: So close! And yet so far! {COMPANY.CompanyName} falls and they are not getting back up, folks!

content.original: From what I've heard, we're looking at a seasoned Solaris veteran, Commander. Make sure we're sending our best. We can't afford to pull punches here.
content.prevOriginal: It's all or nothing, Commander.
content.content: Судя по тому, что я слышал, перед нами опытный ветеран Соляриса, командир. Убедитесь, что мы отправляем лучших. Мы не можем позволить себе бить не во всю силу.

content.original: Defeat the opposing finalist
content.prevOriginal: Win in a duel
content.content: Одолеть вражеского финалиста

content.original: You've done well to get this far, Commander. It's a fresh day, the arena is prepped, and the turnout is massive! Unsurprisingly, your opponent is one of the best Mechjocks around, in a nasty piece of work 'Mech. Good luck!
content.prevOriginal: FINAL of the Solaris Assault Championship.
content.content: Вы хорошо потрудились, и зашли очень далеко, командир. Сегодня все смотрят только на вас, арена уже ждёт, а зрителей набралась масса! Ваш противник - один из лучших мехводов в округе, а мех его - довольно мерзкая штуковина. Ну, удачи!

content.content: Дамы и господа, добро пожаловать на бой Штурмовой лиги Соляриса! Да начнется бой!

content.original: Enemy is straight ahead, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Enemy is straight ahead, Commander.
content.content: Враг прямо по курсу, командир.

content.original: Good hunting, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.prevOriginal: Good hunting, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.content: Доброй охоты, командир. Оливейра конец связи.

content.original: That's all the opponents destroyed, Commander. Well done.
content.prevOriginal: That's all the opponents destroyed, Commander. Well done.
content.content: Это были последние противники, командир. Отличная работа.

content.original: We lost this one, better luck next time, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: We lost this one, better luck next time, Commander.
content.content: Мы проиграли. В следующий раз повезёт, командир.

content.original: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!
content.prevOriginal: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!
content.content: Основная цель получает урон, командир! Продолжайте в том же духе!

content.original: Commander, this is a very straightforward match: eliminate all your opposition for the win.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, this is a very straightforward match: eliminate all your opposition for the win.
content.content: Командир, задача одна: уничтожить всех противников.

content.content: Уничтожьте юниты врага

content.original: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to Solaris Assault League battle! Let the fight begin!

content.original: Commander, the Flag location is straight ahead.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, the Flag location is straight ahead.
content.content: Командир, флаг прямо по курсу.

content.original: Once you have secured the Flag, you need to get to the extraction zone.
content.prevOriginal: Once you have secured the Flag, you need to get to the extraction zone.
content.content: Как только вы возьмете флаг, нужно будет добраться до зоны эвакуации.

content.original: Best of luck, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.prevOriginal: Best of luck, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.content: Желаю удачи, командир. Оливейра конец связи.

content.original: The Flag has been recovered, Commander. Now you need to bring it to the extraction point.
content.prevOriginal: The Flag has been recovered, Commander. Now you need to bring it to the extraction point.
content.content: Флаг подобран, командир. Теперь вам нужно доставить его в точку эвакуации.

content.original: This went south in a hurry. Better luck next time.
content.prevOriginal: This went south in a hurry. Better luck next time.
content.content: Все довольно быстро пошло наперекосяк. В следующий раз повезет больше.

content.original: Hold this location until the Flag is captured.
content.prevOriginal: Hold this location until the Flag is captured.
content.content: Удерживайте это место, пока флаг не будет захвачен.

content.original: The mech carrying the Flag is sustaining damage, Commander!
content.prevOriginal: The mech carrying the Flag is sustaining damage, Commander!
content.content: Мех, несущий флаг, под огнём, командир!

content.original: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Второй груз под огнём, командир!

content.original: The Flag has been recovered, Commander. Good work.
content.prevOriginal: The Flag has been recovered, Commander. Good work.
content.content: Флаг забран, командир. Хорошая работа.

content.original: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset has been recovered, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset has been recovered, Commander.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Второй груз подобран, командир.

content.original: That's it, mech recovering our Secondary Target is scraped. S&R will look for what's left. That objective is failed. Focus on the Primary.
content.prevOriginal: That's it, mech recovering our Secondary Target is scraped. S&R will look for what's left. That objective is failed. Focus on the Primary.
content.content: Ну всё, мех перевозящий вторую цель превратился в лом. Cпасательная команда потом поищет, что осталось. Эта цель провалена. Сосредоточьтесь на первичной.

content.original: Commander, you have to get to the target area, get the flag and extract. Or eliminate all the opposition.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, you have to get to the target area, get the flag and extract. Or eliminate all the opposition.
content.content: Командир, вы должны добраться до целевой зоны, взять флаг и убраться оттуда. Либо уничтожить всю оппозицию.

content.prevOriginal: Capture the Flag and Escape
content.content: Захватите флаг и сбегите

content.content: Дамы и господа, добро пожаловать на бой Штурмовой лиги Соляриса! Да начнется бой!

content.original: You're approaching the encounter area, Commander. First enemy lance is in this area.
content.prevOriginal: You're approaching the encounter area, Commander. First enemy lance is in this area.
content.content: Вы приближаетесь к зоне боевых действий, командир. Первый вражеский отряд находится неподалёку.

content.original: The second enemy lance was last seen here.
content.prevOriginal: The second enemy lance was last seen here.
content.content: Второе вражеское копье в последний раз видели здесь.

content.original: Good luck, Commander. Oliviera out.
content.prevOriginal: Good luck, Commander. Oliviera out.
content.content: Удачи, командир. Оливейра конец связи.

content.original: Another successful mission in the bag, Commander. Let's debrief once you're back aboard.
content.prevOriginal: Another successful mission in the bag, Commander. Let's debrief once you're back aboard.
content.content: Ещё одна успешная миссия в кармане, командир. Давайте подведем итоги, как только вы вернетесь на борт.

content.original: The primary targets are down. That's a wrap.
content.prevOriginal: The primary targets are down. That's a wrap.
content.content: Основные цели уничтожены. На этом всё.

content.original: I'm inbound to the LZ, Commander. Get your people over there for pickup.
content.prevOriginal: I'm inbound to the LZ, Commander. Get your people over there for pickup.
content.content: Я приближаюсь к зоне посадки, командир. Ведите своих сюда для подбора.

content.original: Hey, Darius I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field. Second enemy lance is unbound?
content.prevOriginal: Hey, Darius—I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field. Second enemy lance is unbound?
content.content: Эй, Дариус, я вижу новые тепловые сигнатуры на поле. Выпустили второе вражеское копье?

content.original: That's affirmative. Take them down as well, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: That's affirmative. Take them down as well, Commander.
content.content: Так точно. Уничтожьте и их, командир.

content.original: I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field, Commander. Our mystery tangos, I'm guessing?
content.prevOriginal: I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field, Commander. Our mystery tangos, I'm guessing?
content.content: Я вижу новые тепловые сигнатуры на поле, командир. Наши загадочные Танго, я полагаю?

content.original: That's affirmative. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} rep has offered a bonus if we eliminate them, as well. Your call, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: That's affirmative. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} rep has offered a bonus if we eliminate them, as well. Your call, Commander.
content.content: Так точно. Представитель {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} предложил бонус, если мы устраним и их. Решать вам, командир.

content.original: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.content: Все наши задачи выполнены, прикройте наш отход, командир.

content.original: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.content: Все наши задачи выполнены, прикройте наш отход, командир.

content.original: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.content: Если мы уйдем раньше них, нам не заплатят за прикрытие их отхода.

content.original: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.content: Спасибо за помощь, дело сделано.

content.original: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.content: Спасибо за помощь, дело сделано.

content.original: That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.content: Вот и все, командир, мы сделали то, ради чего пришли.

content.original: That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.content: Вот и все, командир, мы сделали то, ради чего пришли.

content.original: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.content: Если мы уйдем раньше них, нам не заплатят за прикрытие их отхода.

content.original: we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.content: Мы вышли из зоны боевых действий. Спасибо, командир.

content.original: That's unfortunate. I'll let our employers know what happened.
content.prevOriginal: That's unfortunate. I'll let our employers know what happened.
content.content: Это прискорбно. Сообщу нашим работодателям о случившемся.

content.original: we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.content: Мы вышли из зоны боевых действий. Спасибо, командир.

content.original: holy cow what a surprise its a {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} lance! A surprise indeed. This is the Primary Objective version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, holy cow what a surprise its a {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} lance! A surprise indeed. This is the Primary Objective version.
content.content: Офигеть, это ж копьё {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name}! Вот так сюрприз. Это наша основная цель.

content.original: Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract. If we want to get paid we need to take them out.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract. If we want to get paid we need to take them out.
content.content: Наш работодатель любезно добавил устранение этой группы в контракт. Если мы хотим, чтобы нам заплатили, нужно разобраться с ними.

content.content: На радаре «Леопард», командир. Похоже, он снижается; отмечу его зону посадки для вас.

content.original: Commander, our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have deployed forces to assist in our operation here. This is the Primary version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Commander, our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have deployed forces to assist in our operation here. This is the Primary version.
content.content: Командир, наши друзья из {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} выставили силы для помощи нам в этом бою. Это основная версия.

content.original: That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's destroyed we have orders to proceed to our Evac.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's destroyed we have orders to proceed to our Evac.
content.content: Так точно, старпом Оливейра. Мы на месте и будем оказывать поддержку для выполнения основной цели. По зевершении, у нас приказ эвакуироваться.

content.original: Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.
content.content: Вас понял, лидер-1. Рад, что вы с нами.

content.original: Commander, our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have deployed forces to assist in our operation here. This is the Secondary version.

content.original: Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.

content.content: Вас понял, лидер-1. Рад, что вы с нами.

content.original: Kilo 1-3 just got smoked! Suffering loses over here, Commander! We're still in the fight, but down one.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Kilo 1-3 just got smoked! Suffering loses over here, Commander! We're still in the fight, but down one.
content.content: Нашему «Кило 1-3» только что дали прикурить! Мы тут несём потери, командир! Мы всё ещё в бою, но потеряли одного.

content.original: Grace under fire folks. Lay it on 'em!
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Grace under fire folks. Lay it on 'em!
content.content: Благодатного огня вам, ребята. Валите их!

content.original: Looks like we have some unexpected support from {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. This is the Primary version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Looks like we have some unexpected support from {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. This is the Primary version.
content.content: Похоже, мы получили неожиданную поддержку от сил {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Name}. Это основная версия.

content.original: Glad we could make it to the party Commander. Our orders are to assist in the Primary Objective and once eliminated head for Evac.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Glad we could make it to the party Commander. Our orders are to assist in the Primary Objective and once eliminated head for Evac.
content.content: Рад, что мы смогли попасть на вечеринку. Наш приказ - оказать содействие в выполнении основной задачи и, как только она будет выполнена, эвакуироваться.

content.original: Copy that lance leader.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Copy that lance leader.
content.content: Понял вас, Лидер-1.

content.original: A Assault League 4x4 3-way team mech deathmatch.
content.prevOriginal: A Assault League 4x4 3-way team mech deathmatch.
content.content: Assault лига 4x4 3-командный бой на смерть.

content.original: 4x4 Assault Free For All Battle
content.prevOriginal: 4x4 Assault Free For All Battle
content.content: 4x4 Assault все против всех

content.original: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to Solaris Assault League battle! Let the fight begin!
content.prevOriginal: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to Solaris Assault League battle! Let the fight begin!
content.content: Дамы и господа, добро пожаловать на бой Штурмовой лиги Соляриса! Да начнется бой!

content.original: You're approaching the encounter area, Commander. First enemy lance is in this area.
content.prevOriginal: You're approaching the encounter area, Commander. First enemy lance is in this area.
content.content: Вы приближаетесь к зоне боевых действий, командир. Первый вражеский отряд находится неподалёку.

content.original: The second enemy lance was last seen here.
content.prevOriginal: The second enemy lance was last seen here.
content.content: Второе вражеское копье в последний раз видели здесь.

content.original: Good luck, Commander. Oliviera out.
content.prevOriginal: Good luck, Commander. Oliviera out.
content.content: Удачи, командир. Оливейра конец связи.

content.original: Another successful mission in the bag, Commander. Let's debrief once you're back aboard.
content.prevOriginal: Another successful mission in the bag, Commander. Let's debrief once you're back aboard.
content.content: Ещё одна успешная миссия в кармане, командир. Давайте подведем итоги, как только вы вернетесь на борт.

content.original: The primary targets are down. That's a wrap.
content.prevOriginal: The primary targets are down. That's a wrap.
content.content: Основные цели уничтожены. На этом всё.

content.original: I'm inbound to the LZ, Commander. Get your people over there for pickup.
content.prevOriginal: I'm inbound to the LZ, Commander. Get your people over there for pickup.
content.content: Я приближаюсь к зоне посадки, командир. Ведите своих сюда для подбора.

content.original: Hey, Darius I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field. Second enemy lance is unbound?
content.prevOriginal: Hey, Darius—I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field. Second enemy lance is unbound?
content.content: Эй, Дариус, я вижу новые тепловые сигнатуры на поле. Выпустили второе вражеское копье?

content.original: That's affirmative. Take them down as well, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: That's affirmative. Take them down as well, Commander.
content.content: Так точно. Уничтожьте и их, командир.

content.original: I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field, Commander. Our mystery tangos, I'm guessing?
content.prevOriginal: I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field, Commander. Our mystery tangos, I'm guessing?
content.content: Я вижу новые тепловые сигнатуры на поле, командир. Наши загадочные Танго, я полагаю?

content.original: That's affirmative. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} rep has offered a bonus if we eliminate them, as well. Your call, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: That's affirmative. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} rep has offered a bonus if we eliminate them, as well. Your call, Commander.
content.content: Так точно. Представитель {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} предложил бонус, если мы устраним и их. Решать вам, командир.

content.original: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.content: Все наши задачи выполнены, прикройте наш отход, командир.

content.original: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.content: Все наши задачи выполнены, прикройте наш отход, командир.

content.original: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.content: Если мы уйдем раньше них, нам не заплатят за прикрытие их отхода.

content.original: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.content: Спасибо за помощь, дело сделано.

content.original: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.content: Спасибо за помощь, дело сделано.

content.original: That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.content: Вот и все, командир, мы сделали то, ради чего пришли.

content.original: That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.content: Вот и все, командир, мы сделали то, ради чего пришли.

content.original: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.content: Если мы уйдем раньше них, нам не заплатят за прикрытие их отхода.

content.original: we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.content: Мы вышли из зоны боевых действий. Спасибо, командир.

content.original: That's unfortunate. I'll let our employers know what happened.
content.prevOriginal: That's unfortunate. I'll let our employers know what happened.
content.content: Это прискорбно. Сообщу нашим работодателям о случившемся.

content.original: we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.content: Мы вышли из зоны боевых действий. Спасибо, командир.

content.original: holy cow what a surprise its a {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} lance! A surprise indeed. This is the Primary Objective version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, holy cow what a surprise its a {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} lance! A surprise indeed. This is the Primary Objective version.
content.content: Офигеть, это ж копьё {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name}! Вот так сюрприз. Это наша основная цель.

content.original: Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract. If we want to get paid we need to take them out.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract. If we want to get paid we need to take them out.
content.content: Наш работодатель любезно добавил устранение этой группы в контракт. Если мы хотим, чтобы нам заплатили, нужно разобраться с ними.

content.original: Commander, our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have deployed forces to assist in our operation here. This is the Primary version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Commander, our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have deployed forces to assist in our operation here. This is the Primary version.
content.content: Командир, наши друзья из {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} выставили силы для помощи нам в этом бою. Это основная версия.

content.original: That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's destroyed we have orders to proceed to our Evac.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's destroyed we have orders to proceed to our Evac.
content.content: Так точно, старпом Оливейра. Мы на месте и будем оказывать поддержку для выполнения основной цели. По зевершении, у нас приказ эвакуироваться.

content.original: Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.
content.content: Вас понял, лидер-1. Рад, что вы с нами.

content.original: Commander, our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have deployed forces to assist in our operation here. This is the Secondary version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Commander, our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have deployed forces to assist in our operation here. This is the Secondary version.
content.content: Командир, наши друзья из {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} выставили силы для помощи нам в этом бою. Это второстепенная версия.

content.original: That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's destroyed we have orders to proceed to our Evac.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's destroyed we have orders to proceed to our Evac.
content.content: Так точно, старпом Оливейра. Мы на месте и будем оказывать поддержку для выполнения основной цели. По зевершении, у нас приказ эвакуироваться.

content.original: Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.
content.content: Вас понял, лидер-1. Рад, что вы с нами.

content.original: Kilo 1-3 just got smoked! Suffering loses over here, Commander! We're still in the fight, but down one.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Kilo 1-3 just got smoked! Suffering loses over here, Commander! We're still in the fight, but down one.
content.content: Нашему «Кило 1-3» только что дали прикурить! Мы тут несём потери, командир! Мы всё ещё в бою, но потеряли одного.

content.original: Grace under fire folks. Lay it on 'em!
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Grace under fire folks. Lay it on 'em!
content.content: Благодатного огня вам, ребята. Валите их!

content.original: Looks like we have some unexpected support from {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. This is the Primary version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Looks like we have some unexpected support from {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. This is the Primary version.
content.content: Похоже, мы получили неожиданную поддержку от сил {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Name}. Это основная версия.

content.original: Glad we could make it to the party Commander. Our orders are to assist in the Primary Objective and once eliminated head for Evac.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Glad we could make it to the party Commander. Our orders are to assist in the Primary Objective and once eliminated head for Evac.
content.content: Рад, что мы смогли попасть на вечеринку. Наш приказ - оказать содействие в выполнении основной задачи и, как только она будет выполнена, эвакуироваться.

content.original: Copy that lance leader.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Copy that lance leader.
content.content: Понял вас, Лидер-1.

content.original: Looks like we have some unexpected support from {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. This is the Secondary version.

content.original: Copy that lance leader.

content.content: Понял вас, Лидер-1.

content.original: We lost Quebec Two Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER We lost Quebec Two Commander.
content.content: Мы потеряли «Квебек-2», командир.

content.prevOriginal: PLACEHODLER This is Quebec actual return fire and check your rear arc!

content.content: {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} уничтожены.

content.original: our employer's ally forces are lost commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER our employer's ally forces are lost commander.
content.content: Союзным войскам нашего работодателя пришёл конец, командир.

content.original: Hark {COMMANDER.Name} here are unexpected {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} bad guys are here too. Don't that beat it all. This is the primary objective version.

content.content: Неожиданно плохие ребята из {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name} тоже здесь. Ну разве это не здорово? Это наша основная цель.

content.original: A Assault League 4x4 3-way team mech deathmatch.
content.prevOriginal: A Assault League 4x4 3-way team mech deathmatch.
content.content: Assault лига 4x4 3-командный бой на смерть.

content.original: 4x4 Assault Free For All Battle
content.prevOriginal: 4x4 Assault Free For All Battle
content.content: 4x4 Assault все против всех

content.original: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to Solaris Assault League battle! Let the fight begin!
content.prevOriginal: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to Solaris Assault League battle! Let the fight begin!
content.content: Дамы и господа, добро пожаловать на бой Штурмовой лиги Соляриса! Да начнется бой!

content.original: You're approaching the encounter area, Commander. First enemy lance is in this area.
content.prevOriginal: You're approaching the encounter area, Commander. First enemy lance is in this area.
content.content: Вы приближаетесь к зоне боевых действий, командир. Первый вражеский отряд находится неподалёку.

content.original: The second enemy lance was last seen here.
content.prevOriginal: The second enemy lance was last seen here.
content.content: Второе вражеское копье в последний раз видели здесь.

content.original: Good luck, Commander. Oliviera out.
content.prevOriginal: Good luck, Commander. Oliviera out.
content.content: Удачи, командир. Оливейра конец связи.

content.original: Another successful mission in the bag, Commander. Let's debrief once you're back aboard.
content.prevOriginal: Another successful mission in the bag, Commander. Let's debrief once you're back aboard.
content.content: Ещё одна успешная миссия в кармане, командир. Давайте подведем итоги, как только вы вернетесь на борт.

content.original: The primary targets are down. That's a wrap.
content.prevOriginal: The primary targets are down. That's a wrap.
content.content: Основные цели уничтожены. На этом всё.

content.original: I'm inbound to the LZ, Commander. Get your people over there for pickup.
content.prevOriginal: I'm inbound to the LZ, Commander. Get your people over there for pickup.
content.content: Я приближаюсь к зоне посадки, командир. Ведите своих сюда для подбора.

content.original: Hey, Darius I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field. Second enemy lance is unbound?
content.prevOriginal: Hey, Darius—I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field. Second enemy lance is unbound?
content.content: Эй, Дариус, я вижу новые тепловые сигнатуры на поле. Выпустили второе вражеское копье?

content.original: That's affirmative. Take them down as well, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: That's affirmative. Take them down as well, Commander.
content.content: Так точно. Уничтожьте и их, командир.

content.original: I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field, Commander. Our mystery tangos, I'm guessing?
content.prevOriginal: I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field, Commander. Our mystery tangos, I'm guessing?
content.content: Я вижу новые тепловые сигнатуры на поле, командир. Наши загадочные Танго, я полагаю?

content.original: That's affirmative. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} rep has offered a bonus if we eliminate them, as well. Your call, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: That's affirmative. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} rep has offered a bonus if we eliminate them, as well. Your call, Commander.
content.content: Так точно. Представитель {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} предложил бонус, если мы устраним и их. Решать вам, командир.

content.original: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.content: Все наши задачи выполнены, прикройте наш отход, командир.

content.original: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.content: Все наши задачи выполнены, прикройте наш отход, командир.

content.original: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.content: Если мы уйдем раньше них, нам не заплатят за прикрытие их отхода.

content.original: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.content: Спасибо за помощь, дело сделано.

content.original: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.content: Спасибо за помощь, дело сделано.

content.original: That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.content: Вот и все, командир, мы сделали то, ради чего пришли.

content.original: That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.content: Вот и все, командир, мы сделали то, ради чего пришли.

content.original: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.content: Если мы уйдем раньше них, нам не заплатят за прикрытие их отхода.

content.original: we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.content: Мы вышли из зоны боевых действий. Спасибо, командир.

content.original: That's unfortunate. I'll let our employers know what happened.
content.prevOriginal: That's unfortunate. I'll let our employers know what happened.
content.content: Это прискорбно. Сообщу нашим работодателям о случившемся.

content.original: we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.content: Мы вышли из зоны боевых действий. Спасибо, командир.

content.content: На радаре «Леопард», командир. Похоже, он снижается; отмечу его зону посадки для вас.

content.original: Commander, our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have deployed forces to assist in our operation here. This is the Primary version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Commander, our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have deployed forces to assist in our operation here. This is the Primary version.
content.content: Командир, наши друзья из {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} выставили силы для помощи нам в этом бою. Это основная версия.

content.original: That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's destroyed we have orders to proceed to our Evac.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's destroyed we have orders to proceed to our Evac.
content.content: Так точно, старпом Оливейра. Мы на месте и будем оказывать поддержку для выполнения основной цели. По зевершении, у нас приказ эвакуироваться.

content.original: Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.
content.content: Вас понял, лидер-1. Рад, что вы с нами.

content.original: Commander, our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have deployed forces to assist in our operation here. This is the Secondary version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Commander, our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have deployed forces to assist in our operation here. This is the Secondary version.
content.content: Командир, наши друзья из {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} выставили силы для помощи нам в этом бою. Это второстепенная версия.

content.original: That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's destroyed we have orders to proceed to our Evac.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's destroyed we have orders to proceed to our Evac.

content.original: Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.
content.content: Вас понял, лидер-1. Рад, что вы с нами.

content.original: Kilo 1-3 just got smoked! Suffering loses over here, Commander! We're still in the fight, but down one.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Kilo 1-3 just got smoked! Suffering loses over here, Commander! We're still in the fight, but down one.
content.content: Нашему «Кило 1-3» только что дали прикурить! Мы тут несём потери, командир! Мы всё ещё в бою, но потеряли одного.

content.original: Grace under fire folks. Lay it on 'em!
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Grace under fire folks. Lay it on 'em!
content.content: Благодатного огня вам, ребята. Валите их!

content.original: Looks like we have some unexpected support from {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. This is the Primary version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Looks like we have some unexpected support from {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. This is the Primary version.
content.content: Похоже, мы получили неожиданную поддержку от сил {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Name}. Это основная версия.

content.original: Glad we could make it to the party Commander. Our orders are to assist in the Primary Objective and once eliminated head for Evac.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Glad we could make it to the party Commander. Our orders are to assist in the Primary Objective and once eliminated head for Evac.
content.content: Рад, что мы смогли попасть на вечеринку. Наш приказ - оказать содействие в выполнении основной задачи и, как только она будет выполнена, эвакуироваться.

content.original: Copy that lance leader.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Copy that lance leader.
content.content: Понял вас, Лидер-1.

content.original: Looks like we have some unexpected support from {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. This is the Secondary version.

content.original: Copy that lance leader.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Copy that lance leader.
content.content: Понял вас, Лидер-1.

content.original: We lost Quebec Two Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER We lost Quebec Two Commander.
content.content: Мы потеряли «Квебек-2», командир.

content.original: PLACEHODLER This is Quebec actual return fire and check your rear arc!
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHODLER This is Quebec actual return fire and check your rear arc!
content.content: PLACEHODLER This is Quebec actual return fire and check your rear arc!

content.original: The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} has been destroyed.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} has been destroyed.
content.content: {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} уничтожены.

content.original: our employer's ally forces are lost commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER our employer's ally forces are lost commander.
content.content: Союзным войскам нашего работодателя пришёл конец, командир.

content.original: Hark {COMMANDER.Name} here are unexpected {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} bad guys are here too. Don't that beat it all. This is the primary objective version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, Hark {COMMANDER.Name} here are unexpected {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} bad guys are here too. Don't that beat it all. This is the primary objective version.
content.content: Неожиданно плохие ребята из {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name} тоже здесь. Ну разве это не здорово? Это наша основная цель.

content.original: Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract. If we want to get paid we need to take them out.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract. If we want to get paid we need to take them out.
content.content: Наш работодатель любезно добавил устранение этой группы в контракт. Если мы хотим, чтобы нам заплатили, нужно разобраться с ними.

content.original: Hark {COMMANDER.Name} here are unexpected {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} bad guys  are here too. Don't that beat it all. This is the secondary objective version.

content.original: Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract as a bonus. If we want to make some extra C-bills we can take them out if we want.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract as a bonus. If we want to make some extra C-bills we can take them out if we want.
content.content: Наш работодатель любезно добавил устранение этой группы в контракт в качестве бонуса. Если мы хотим заработать пару дополнительных C-bills, можно заняться и ими, при желании.

content.content: Командир, в этом матче участвуют 3 копья. Кто выживет - побеждает.

content.original: Solaris Assault League
content.prevOriginal: Solaris Assault League
content.content: Штурмовая лига Соляриса

content.original: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to Solaris Assault League! Let the fight begin!
content.prevOriginal: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to Solaris Assault League! Let the fight begin!
content.content: Дамы и господа, добро пожаловать в Штурмовую лигу Соляриса! Да начнется бой!

content.original: Commander, another match in the Assault League. Good luck!
content.prevOriginal: Commander, another match in the Assault League. Good luck!
content.content: Командир, очередной матч Штурмовой лиги. Удачи!

content.original: And there we go!
content.prevOriginal: And there we go!
content.content: Вот так вот!

content.original: Ok, that was unfortunate. Let's prepare for the next match better.
content.prevOriginal: Ok, that was unfortunate. Let's prepare for the next match better.
content.content: Ок, не свезло. Давайте к следующему матчу подготовимся получше.

content.original: We will be fighting one of the best opponents here.
content.prevOriginal: We will be fighting one of the best opponents here.
content.content: Мы будем сражаться с одним из лучших соперников.

content.original: Win in a duel
content.prevOriginal: Win in a duel
content.content: Победите в дуэли

content.original: This is a Solaris Assault Mech match. You fight to win prize money and gain notoriety.
content.prevOriginal: This is a Solaris Assault League match. You fight to win prize money, gain Solaris notoriety and qualify for the Assault Championship.
content.content: Это матч штурмовых мехов Solaris. Вы сражаетесь, чтобы выиграть призовые деньги и стать известнее.

content.original: Solaris Assault League
content.prevOriginal: Solaris Assault League

content.prevOriginal: The Flag has been recovered, Commander. Now you need to bring it to the extraction point.
content.content: Флаг подобран, командир. Теперь вам нужно доставить его в точку эвакуации.

content.original: This went south in a hurry. Better luck next time.
content.prevOriginal: This went south in a hurry. Better luck next time.
content.content: Все довольно быстро пошло наперекосяк. В следующий раз повезет больше.

content.original: Hold this location until the Flag is captured.
content.prevOriginal: Hold this location until the Flag is captured.
content.content: Удерживайте это место, пока флаг не будет захвачен.

content.original: The mech carrying the Flag is sustaining damage, Commander!
content.prevOriginal: The mech carrying the Flag is sustaining damage, Commander!
content.content: Мех, несущий флаг, под огнём, командир!

content.original: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Второй груз под огнём, командир!

content.original: The Flag has been recovered, Commander. Good work.
content.prevOriginal: The Flag has been recovered, Commander. Good work.
content.content: Флаг забран, командир. Хорошая работа.

content.original: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset has been recovered, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset has been recovered, Commander.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Второй груз подобран, командир.

content.original: That's it, mech recovering our Secondary Target is scraped. S&R will look for what's left. That objective is failed. Focus on the Primary.
content.prevOriginal: That's it, mech recovering our Secondary Target is scraped. S&R will look for what's left. That objective is failed. Focus on the Primary.
content.content: Ну всё, мех перевозящий вторую цель превратился в лом. Cпасательная команда потом поищет, что осталось. Эта цель провалена. Сосредоточьтесь на первичной.

content.content: Матч по захвату флага в Heavy лиге 4х4.

content.original: 4x4 Heavy Mech Capture the Flag
content.prevOriginal: 4x4 Heavy Mech Capture the Flag
content.content: 4x4 захват флага на тяжелых мехах

content.original: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to Solaris Heavy League battle! Let the fight begin!
content.prevOriginal: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to Solaris Heavy League battle! Let the fight begin!
content.content: Дамы и господа, добро пожаловать на бой тяжелой лиги Соляриса! Да начнется битва!

content.original: Commander, the Flag location is straight ahead.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, the Flag location is straight ahead.
content.content: Командир, флаг прямо по курсу.

content.original: Once you have secured the Flag, you need to get to the extraction zone.
content.prevOriginal: Once you have secured the Flag, you need to get to the extraction zone.
content.content: Как только вы возьмете флаг, нужно будет добраться до зоны эвакуации.

content.original: Best of luck, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.prevOriginal: Best of luck, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.content: Желаю удачи, командир. Оливейра конец связи.

content.original: The Flag has been recovered, Commander. Now you need to bring it to the extraction point.
content.prevOriginal: The Flag has been recovered, Commander. Now you need to bring it to the extraction point.
content.content: Флаг подобран, командир. Теперь вам нужно доставить его в точку эвакуации.

content.original: This went south in a hurry. Better luck next time.
content.prevOriginal: This went south in a hurry. Better luck next time.
content.content: Все довольно быстро пошло наперекосяк. В следующий раз повезет больше.

content.original: Hold this location until the Flag is captured.
content.prevOriginal: Hold this location until the Flag is captured.
content.content: Удерживайте это место, пока флаг не будет захвачен.

content.original: The mech carrying the Flag is sustaining damage, Commander!
content.prevOriginal: The mech carrying the Flag is sustaining damage, Commander!
content.content: Мех, несущий флаг, под огнём, командир!

content.original: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Второй груз под огнём, командир!

content.original: The Flag has been recovered, Commander. Good work.
content.prevOriginal: The Flag has been recovered, Commander. Good work.
content.content: Флаг забран, командир. Хорошая работа.

content.original: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset has been recovered, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset has been recovered, Commander.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Второй груз подобран, командир.

content.original: That's it, mech recovering our Secondary Target is scraped. S&R will look for what's left. That objective is failed. Focus on the Primary.
content.prevOriginal: That's it, mech recovering our Secondary Target is scraped. S&R will look for what's left. That objective is failed. Focus on the Primary.
content.content: Ну всё, мех перевозящий вторую цель превратился в лом. Cпасательная команда потом поищет, что осталось. Эта цель провалена. Сосредоточьтесь на первичной.

content.original: Commander, you have to get to the target area, get the flag and extract. Or eliminate all the opposition.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, you have to get to the target area, get the flag and extract. Or eliminate all the opposition.
content.content: Командир, вы должны добраться до целевой зоны, взять флаг и убраться оттуда. Либо уничтожить всю оппозицию.

content.original: Capture the Flag and Escape
content.prevOriginal: Capture the Flag and Escape
content.content: Захватите флаг и сбегите

content.original: UNUSED KILL OBJECTIVE for AutoComplete
content.prevOriginal: UNUSED KILL OBJECTIVE for AutoComplete
content.content: UNUSED KILL OBJECTIVE for AutoComplete

content.prevOriginal: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for OpFor1
content.content: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for OpFor1

content.prevOriginal: Reach the Evac Zone

content.prevOriginal: Unit Carrying the Flag Must Survive
content.content: Юнит, несущий флаг, должен выжить.

content.original: Recover the VIP's assistant by securing the Secondary Designated Area
content.prevOriginal: Recover the VIP's assistant by securing the Secondary Designated Area
content.content: Верните ассистента VIP, заняв вторую обозначенную область

content.prevOriginal: A Heavy League 4x4 capture the flag match.
content.content: Матч по захвату флага в Heavy лиге 4х4.

content.prevOriginal: 4x4 Heavy Free For All Battle
content.content: 4x4 Heavy все против всех

content.original: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to Solaris Heavy League battle! Let the fight begin!
content.prevOriginal: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to Solaris Heavy League battle! Let the fight begin!
content.content: Дамы и господа, добро пожаловать на бой тяжелой лиги Соляриса! Да начнется битва!

content.original: You're approaching the encounter area, Commander. First enemy lance is in this area.
content.prevOriginal: You're approaching the encounter area, Commander. First enemy lance is in this area.
content.content: Вы приближаетесь к зоне боевых действий, командир. Первый вражеский отряд находится неподалёку.

content.original: The second enemy lance was last seen here.
content.prevOriginal: The second enemy lance was last seen here.
content.content: Второе вражеское копье в последний раз видели здесь.

content.original: Good luck, Commander. Oliviera out.
content.prevOriginal: Good luck, Commander. Oliviera out.
content.content: Удачи, командир. Оливейра конец связи.

content.original: Another successful mission in the bag, Commander. Let's debrief once you're back aboard.
content.prevOriginal: Another successful mission in the bag, Commander. Let's debrief once you're back aboard.
content.content: Ещё одна успешная миссия в кармане, командир. Давайте подведем итоги, как только вы вернетесь на борт.

content.original: The primary targets are down. That's a wrap.
content.prevOriginal: The primary targets are down. That's a wrap.
content.content: Основные цели уничтожены. На этом всё.

content.original: I'm inbound to the LZ, Commander. Get your people over there for pickup.
content.prevOriginal: I'm inbound to the LZ, Commander. Get your people over there for pickup.
content.content: Я приближаюсь к зоне посадки, командир. Ведите своих сюда для подбора.

content.original: Hey, Darius I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field. Second enemy lance is unbound?
content.prevOriginal: Hey, Darius—I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field. Second enemy lance is unbound?
content.content: Эй, Дариус, я вижу новые тепловые сигнатуры на поле. Выпустили второе вражеское копье?

content.original: That's affirmative. Take them down as well, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: That's affirmative. Take them down as well, Commander.
content.content: Так точно. Уничтожьте и их, командир.

content.original: I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field, Commander. Our mystery tangos, I'm guessing?
content.prevOriginal: I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field, Commander. Our mystery tangos, I'm guessing?
content.content: Я вижу новые тепловые сигнатуры на поле, командир. Наши загадочные Танго, я полагаю?

content.original: That's affirmative. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} rep has offered a bonus if we eliminate them, as well. Your call, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: That's affirmative. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} rep has offered a bonus if we eliminate them, as well. Your call, Commander.
content.content: Так точно. Представитель {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} предложил бонус, если мы устраним и их. Решать вам, командир.

content.original: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.content: Все наши задачи выполнены, прикройте наш отход, командир.

content.original: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.content: Все наши задачи выполнены, прикройте наш отход, командир.

content.original: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.content: Если мы уйдем раньше них, нам не заплатят за прикрытие их отхода.

content.original: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.content: Спасибо за помощь, дело сделано.

content.original: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.content: Спасибо за помощь, дело сделано.

content.original: That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.content: Вот и все, командир, мы сделали то, ради чего пришли.

content.original: That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.content: Вот и все, командир, мы сделали то, ради чего пришли.

content.original: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.content: Если мы уйдем раньше них, нам не заплатят за прикрытие их отхода.

content.original: we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.content: Мы вышли из зоны боевых действий. Спасибо, командир.

content.original: That's unfortunate. I'll let our employers know what happened.
content.prevOriginal: That's unfortunate. I'll let our employers know what happened.
content.content: Это прискорбно. Сообщу нашим работодателям о случившемся.

content.original: we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.content: Мы вышли из зоны боевых действий. Спасибо, командир.

content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, holy cow what a surprise its a {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} lance! A surprise indeed. This is the Primary Objective version.
content.content: Офигеть, это ж копьё {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name}! Вот так сюрприз. Это наша основная цель.

content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract. If we want to get paid we need to take them out.
content.content: Наш работодатель любезно добавил устранение этой группы в контракт. Если мы хотим, чтобы нам заплатили, нужно разобраться с ними.

content.original: Commander, our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have deployed forces to assist in our operation here. This is the Primary version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Commander, our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have deployed forces to assist in our operation here. This is the Primary version.
content.content: Командир, наши друзья из {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} выставили силы для помощи нам в этом бою. Это основная версия.

content.original: That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's destroyed we have orders to proceed to our Evac.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's destroyed we have orders to proceed to our Evac.
content.content: Так точно, старпом Оливейра. Мы на месте и будем оказывать поддержку для выполнения основной цели. По зевершении, у нас приказ эвакуироваться.

content.original: Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.
content.content: Вас понял, лидер-1. Рад, что вы с нами.

content.original: Commander, our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have deployed forces to assist in our operation here. This is the Secondary version.

content.original: Kilo 1-3 just got smoked! Suffering loses over here, Commander! We're still in the fight, but down one.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Kilo 1-3 just got smoked! Suffering loses over here, Commander! We're still in the fight, but down one.

content.original: Grace under fire folks. Lay it on 'em!
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Grace under fire folks. Lay it on 'em!
content.content: Благодатного огня вам, ребята. Валите их!

content.original: Glad we could make it to the party Commander. Our orders are to assist in the Primary Objective and once eliminated head for Evac.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Glad we could make it to the party Commander. Our orders are to assist in the Primary Objective and once eliminated head for Evac.
content.content: Рад, что мы смогли попасть на вечеринку. Наш приказ - оказать содействие в выполнении основной задачи и, как только она будет выполнена, эвакуироваться.

content.original: Copy that lance leader.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Copy that lance leader.

content.prevOriginal: A Heavy League 4x4 3-way team mech deathmatch.
