content.content: Дамы и господа, добро пожаловать на межсезонную битву Соляриса! Да начнется битва!

content.original: You're approaching the encounter area, Commander. First enemy lance is in this area.
content.prevOriginal: You're approaching the encounter area, Commander. First enemy lance is in this area.
content.content: Вы приближаетесь к зоне боевых действий, командир. Первый вражеский отряд находится неподалёку.

content.original: The second enemy lance was last seen here.
content.prevOriginal: The second enemy lance was last seen here.
content.content: Второе вражеское копье в последний раз видели здесь.

content.original: Good luck, Commander. Oliviera out.
content.prevOriginal: Good luck, Commander. Oliviera out.
content.content: Удачи, командир. Оливейра конец связи.

content.original: Another successful mission in the bag, Commander. Let's debrief once you're back aboard.
content.prevOriginal: Another successful mission in the bag, Commander. Let's debrief once you're back aboard.
content.content: Ещё одна успешная миссия в кармане, командир. Давайте подведем итоги, как только вы вернетесь на борт.

content.original: The primary targets are down. That's a wrap.
content.prevOriginal: The primary targets are down. That's a wrap.
content.content: Основные цели уничтожены. На этом всё.

content.original: I'm inbound to the LZ, Commander. Get your people over there for pickup.
content.prevOriginal: I'm inbound to the LZ, Commander. Get your people over there for pickup.
content.content: Я приближаюсь к зоне посадки, командир. Ведите своих сюда для подбора.

content.original: Hey, Darius—I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field. Second enemy lance is unbound?
content.prevOriginal: Hey, Darius—I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field. Second enemy lance is unbound?
content.content: Эй, Дариус, я вижу новые тепловые сигнатуры на поле. Выпустили второе вражеское копье?

content.original: That's affirmative. Take them down as well, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: That's affirmative. Take them down as well, Commander.
content.content: Так точно. Уничтожьте и их, командир.

content.original: I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field, Commander. Our mystery tangos, I'm guessing?
content.prevOriginal: I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field, Commander. Our mystery tangos, I'm guessing?
content.content: Я вижу новые тепловые сигнатуры на поле, командир. Наши загадочные Танго, я полагаю?

content.original: That's affirmative. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} rep has offered a bonus if we eliminate them, as well. Your call, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: That's affirmative. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} rep has offered a bonus if we eliminate them, as well. Your call, Commander.
content.content: Так точно. Представитель {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} предложил бонус, если мы устраним и их. Решать вам, командир.

content.original: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.content: Все наши задачи выполнены, прикройте наш отход, командир.

content.original: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.content: Все наши задачи выполнены, прикройте наш отход, командир.

content.original: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.content: Если мы уйдем раньше них, нам не заплатят за прикрытие их отхода.

content.original: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.content: Спасибо за помощь, дело сделано.

content.original: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.content: Спасибо за помощь, дело сделано.

content.original: That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.content: Вот и все, командир, мы сделали то, ради чего пришли.

content.original: That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.content: Вот и все, командир, мы сделали то, ради чего пришли.

content.original: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.content: Если мы уйдем раньше них, нам не заплатят за прикрытие их отхода.

content.original: we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.content: Мы вышли из зоны боевых действий. Спасибо, командир.

content.original: That's unfortunate. I'll let our employers know what happened.
content.prevOriginal: That's unfortunate. I'll let our employers know what happened.
content.content: Это прискорбно. Сообщу нашим работодателям о случившемся.

content.original: we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.content: Мы вышли из зоны боевых действий. Спасибо, командир.

content.original: holy cow what a surprise its a {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} lance! A surprise indeed. This is the Primary Objective version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, holy cow what a surprise its a {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} lance! A surprise indeed. This is the Primary Objective version.
content.content: Офигеть, это ж копьё {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name}! Вот так сюрприз. Это наша основная цель.

content.original: Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract. If we want to get paid we need to take them out.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract. If we want to get paid we need to take them out.
content.content: Наш работодатель любезно добавил устранение этой группы в контракт. Если мы хотим, чтобы нам заплатили, нужно разобраться с ними.

content.original: holy cow what a surprise its a {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} lance! A surprise indeed. This is the Secondary Objective version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, holy cow what a surprise its a {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} lance! A surprise indeed. This is the Secondary Objective version.
content.content: Офигеть, это ж копьё {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name}! Вот так сюрприз. Это наша второстепенная цель.

content.original: Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract as a bonus. If we want to make some extra C-bills we can take them out if we want.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract as a bonus. If we want to make some extra C-bills we can take them out if we want.
content.content: Наш работодатель любезно добавил устранение этой группы в контракт в качестве бонуса. Если мы хотим заработать пару дополнительных C-bills, можно заняться и ими, при желании.

content.original: That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's destroyed we have orders to proceed to our Evac.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's destroyed we have orders to proceed to our Evac.
content.content: Так точно, старпом Оливейра. Мы на месте и будем оказывать поддержку для выполнения основной цели. По зевершении, у нас приказ эвакуироваться.

content.original: Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.
content.content: Вас понял, лидер-1. Рад, что вы с нами.

content.original: Kilo 1-3 just got smoked! Suffering loses over here, Commander! We're still in the fight, but down one.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Kilo 1-3 just got smoked! Suffering loses over here, Commander! We're still in the fight, but down one.

content.original: Grace under fire folks. Lay it on 'em!
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Grace under fire folks. Lay it on 'em!
content.content: Благодатного огня вам, ребята. Валите их!

content.original: Looks like we have some unexpected support from {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. This is the Primary version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Looks like we have some unexpected support from {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. This is the Primary version.
content.content: Похоже, мы получили неожиданную поддержку от сил {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Name}. Это основная версия.

content.original: Glad we could make it to the party Commander. Our orders are to assist in the Primary Objective and once eliminated head for Evac.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Glad we could make it to the party Commander. Our orders are to assist in the Primary Objective and once eliminated head for Evac.
content.content: Рад, что мы смогли попасть на вечеринку. Наш приказ - оказать содействие в выполнении основной задачи и, как только она будет выполнена, эвакуироваться.

content.content: Дамы и господа, добро пожаловать на межсезонную битву Соляриса! Да начнется битва!

content.original: You're approaching the encounter area, Commander. First enemy lance is in this area.
content.prevOriginal: You're approaching the encounter area, Commander. First enemy lance is in this area.
content.content: Вы приближаетесь к зоне боевых действий, командир. Первый вражеский отряд находится неподалёку.

content.original: The second enemy lance was last seen here.
content.prevOriginal: The second enemy lance was last seen here.
content.content: Второе вражеское копье в последний раз видели здесь.

content.original: Good luck, Commander. Oliviera out.
content.prevOriginal: Good luck, Commander. Oliviera out.
content.content: Удачи, командир. Оливейра конец связи.

content.original: Another successful mission in the bag, Commander. Let's debrief once you're back aboard.
content.prevOriginal: Another successful mission in the bag, Commander. Let's debrief once you're back aboard.
content.content: Ещё одна успешная миссия в кармане, командир. Давайте подведем итоги, как только вы вернетесь на борт.

content.original: The primary targets are down. That's a wrap.
content.prevOriginal: The primary targets are down. That's a wrap.
content.content: Основные цели уничтожены. На этом всё.

content.original: I'm inbound to the LZ, Commander. Get your people over there for pickup.
content.prevOriginal: I'm inbound to the LZ, Commander. Get your people over there for pickup.
content.content: Я приближаюсь к зоне посадки, командир. Ведите своих сюда для подбора.

content.original: Hey, Darius—I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field. Second enemy lance is unbound?
content.prevOriginal: Hey, Darius—I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field. Second enemy lance is unbound?
content.content: Эй, Дариус, я вижу новые тепловые сигнатуры на поле. Выпустили второе вражеское копье?

content.original: That's affirmative. Take them down as well, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: That's affirmative. Take them down as well, Commander.
content.content: Так точно. Уничтожьте и их, командир.

content.original: I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field, Commander. Our mystery tangos, I'm guessing?
content.prevOriginal: I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field, Commander. Our mystery tangos, I'm guessing?
content.content: Я вижу новые тепловые сигнатуры на поле, командир. Наши загадочные Танго, я полагаю?

content.original: That's affirmative. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} rep has offered a bonus if we eliminate them, as well. Your call, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: That's affirmative. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} rep has offered a bonus if we eliminate them, as well. Your call, Commander.
content.content: Так точно. Представитель {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} предложил бонус, если мы устраним и их. Решать вам, командир.

content.original: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.content: Все наши задачи выполнены, прикройте наш отход, командир.

content.original: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.content: Все наши задачи выполнены, прикройте наш отход, командир.

content.original: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.content: Если мы уйдем раньше них, нам не заплатят за прикрытие их отхода.

content.original: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.content: Спасибо за помощь, дело сделано.

content.original: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.content: Спасибо за помощь, дело сделано.

content.original: That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.content: Вот и все, командир, мы сделали то, ради чего пришли.

content.original: That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.content: Вот и все, командир, мы сделали то, ради чего пришли.

content.original: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.content: Если мы уйдем раньше них, нам не заплатят за прикрытие их отхода.

content.original: we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.content: Мы вышли из зоны боевых действий. Спасибо, командир.

content.original: That's unfortunate. I'll let our employers know what happened.
content.prevOriginal: That's unfortunate. I'll let our employers know what happened.
content.content: Это прискорбно. Сообщу нашим работодателям о случившемся.

content.original: we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.content: Мы вышли из зоны боевых действий. Спасибо, командир.

content.original: holy cow what a surprise its a {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} lance! A surprise indeed. This is the Primary Objective version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, holy cow what a surprise its a {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} lance! A surprise indeed. This is the Primary Objective version.
content.content: Офигеть, это ж копьё {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name}! Вот так сюрприз. Это наша основная цель.

content.original: Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract. If we want to get paid we need to take them out.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract. If we want to get paid we need to take them out.
content.content: Наш работодатель любезно добавил устранение этой группы в контракт. Если мы хотим, чтобы нам заплатили, нужно разобраться с ними.

content.original: holy cow what a surprise its a {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} lance! A surprise indeed. This is the Secondary Objective version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, holy cow what a surprise its a {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} lance! A surprise indeed. This is the Secondary Objective version.

content.original: Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract as a bonus. If we want to make some extra C-bills we can take them out if we want.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract as a bonus. If we want to make some extra C-bills we can take them out if we want.
content.content: Наш работодатель любезно добавил устранение этой группы в контракт в качестве бонуса. Если мы хотим заработать пару дополнительных C-bills, можно заняться и ими, при желании.

content.prevOriginal: Commander, we have visuals on the second enemy lance.
content.content: Командир, наблюдаем второе вражеское копьё.

content.original: Got a Leopard on radar, Commander. Looks like it's making a drop; I'll mark its LZ for you.
content.prevOriginal: Got a Leopard on radar, Commander. Looks like it's making a drop; I'll mark its LZ for you.
content.content: На радаре «Леопард», командир. Похоже, он снижается; отмечу его зону посадки для вас.

content.prevOriginal: PLACHEHOLDER (Hostile to All Secondary). In bound hostile Dropship detected, drop zone marked.

content.original: Commander, our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have deployed forces to assist in our operation here. This is the Primary version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Commander, our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have deployed forces to assist in our operation here. This is the Primary version.
content.content: Командир, наши друзья из {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} выставили силы для помощи нам в этом бою. Это основная версия.

content.original: That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's destroyed we have orders to proceed to our Evac.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's destroyed we have orders to proceed to our Evac.
content.content: Так точно, старпом Оливейра. Мы на месте и будем оказывать поддержку для выполнения основной цели. По зевершении, у нас приказ эвакуироваться.

content.original: Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.
content.content: Вас понял, лидер-1. Рад, что вы с нами.

content.original: Commander, our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have deployed forces to assist in our operation here. This is the Secondary version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Commander, our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have deployed forces to assist in our operation here. This is the Secondary version.

content.original: Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.
content.content: Вас понял, лидер-1. Рад, что вы с нами.

content.original: Kilo 1-3 just got smoked! Suffering loses over here, Commander! We're still in the fight, but down one.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Kilo 1-3 just got smoked! Suffering loses over here, Commander! We're still in the fight, but down one.
content.content: Нашему «Кило 1-3» только что дали прикурить! Мы тут несём потери, командир! Мы всё ещё в бою, но потеряли одного.

content.original: Grace under fire folks. Lay it on 'em!
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Grace under fire folks. Lay it on 'em!
content.content: Благодатного огня вам, ребята. Валите их!

content.original: Looks like we have some unexpected support from {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. This is the Primary version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Looks like we have some unexpected support from {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. This is the Primary version.
content.content: Похоже, мы получили неожиданную поддержку от сил {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Name}. Это основная версия.

content.original: Glad we could make it to the party Commander. Our orders are to assist in the Primary Objective and once eliminated head for Evac.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Glad we could make it to the party Commander. Our orders are to assist in the Primary Objective and once eliminated head for Evac.
content.content: Рад, что мы смогли попасть на вечеринку. Наш приказ - оказать содействие в выполнении основной задачи и, как только она будет выполнена, эвакуироваться.

content.original: Copy that lance leader.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Copy that lance leader.
content.content: Понял вас, Лидер-1.

content.original: Looks like we have some unexpected support from {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. This is the Secondary version.

content.original: Copy that lance leader.

content.original: We lost Quebec Two Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER We lost Quebec Two Commander.

content.prevOriginal: 4x4 Free For All Battle
content.content: 4x4 все против всех

content.original: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to Solaris off-season battle! Let the fight begin!
content.prevOriginal: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to Solaris off-season battle! Let the fight begin!
content.content: Дамы и господа, добро пожаловать на межсезонную битву Соляриса! Да начнется битва!

content.original: You're approaching the encounter area, Commander. First enemy lance is in this area.
content.prevOriginal: You're approaching the encounter area, Commander. First enemy lance is in this area.
content.content: Вы приближаетесь к зоне боевых действий, командир. Первый вражеский отряд находится неподалёку.

content.original: The second enemy lance was last seen here.
content.prevOriginal: The second enemy lance was last seen here.
content.content: Второе вражеское копье в последний раз видели здесь.

content.original: Good luck, Commander. Oliviera out.
content.prevOriginal: Good luck, Commander. Oliviera out.
content.content: Удачи, командир. Оливейра конец связи.

content.original: Another successful mission in the bag, Commander. Let's debrief once you're back aboard.
content.prevOriginal: Another successful mission in the bag, Commander. Let's debrief once you're back aboard.
content.content: Ещё одна успешная миссия в кармане, командир. Давайте подведем итоги, как только вы вернетесь на борт.

content.original: The primary targets are down. That's a wrap.
content.prevOriginal: The primary targets are down. That's a wrap.
content.content: Основные цели уничтожены. На этом всё.

content.original: I'm inbound to the LZ, Commander. Get your people over there for pickup.
content.prevOriginal: I'm inbound to the LZ, Commander. Get your people over there for pickup.
content.content: Я приближаюсь к зоне посадки, командир. Ведите своих сюда для подбора.

content.original: Hey, Darius—I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field. Second enemy lance is unbound?
content.prevOriginal: Hey, Darius—I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field. Second enemy lance is unbound?
content.content: Эй, Дариус, я вижу новые тепловые сигнатуры на поле. Выпустили второе вражеское копье?

content.original: That's affirmative. Take them down as well, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: That's affirmative. Take them down as well, Commander.
content.content: Так точно. Уничтожьте и их, командир.

content.original: I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field, Commander. Our mystery tangos, I'm guessing?
content.prevOriginal: I'm seeing new heat signatures on the field, Commander. Our mystery tangos, I'm guessing?
content.content: Я вижу новые тепловые сигнатуры на поле, командир. Наши загадочные Танго, я полагаю?

content.original: That's affirmative. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} rep has offered a bonus if we eliminate them, as well. Your call, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: That's affirmative. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} rep has offered a bonus if we eliminate them, as well. Your call, Commander.
content.content: Так точно. Представитель {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} предложил бонус, если мы устраним и их. Решать вам, командир.

content.original: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.content: Все наши задачи выполнены, прикройте наш отход, командир.

content.original: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw Commander.
content.content: Все наши задачи выполнены, прикройте наш отход, командир.

content.original: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.content: Если мы уйдем раньше них, нам не заплатят за прикрытие их отхода.

content.original: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.content: Спасибо за помощь, дело сделано.

content.original: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
content.content: Спасибо за помощь, дело сделано.

content.original: That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.content: Вот и все, командир, мы сделали то, ради чего пришли.

content.original: That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, That's it Commander we did what we came here to do.
content.content: Вот и все, командир, мы сделали то, ради чего пришли.

content.original: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
content.content: Если мы уйдем раньше них, нам не заплатят за прикрытие их отхода.

content.original: we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.content: Мы вышли из зоны боевых действий. Спасибо, командир.

content.original: That's unfortunate. I'll let our employers know what happened.
content.prevOriginal: That's unfortunate. I'll let our employers know what happened.
content.content: Это прискорбно. Сообщу нашим работодателям о случившемся.

content.original: we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, we're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
content.content: Мы вышли из зоны боевых действий. Спасибо, командир.

content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, holy cow what a surprise its a {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} lance! A surprise indeed. This is the Primary Objective version.
content.content: Офигеть, это ж копьё {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name}! Вот так сюрприз. Это наша основная цель.

content.content: Наш работодатель любезно добавил устранение этой группы в контракт. Если мы хотим, чтобы нам заплатили, нужно разобраться с ними.

content.original: That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's destroyed we have orders to proceed to our Evac.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's destroyed we have orders to proceed to our Evac.

content.original: Kilo 1-3 just got smoked! Suffering loses over here, Commander! We're still in the fight, but down one.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Kilo 1-3 just got smoked! Suffering loses over here, Commander! We're still in the fight, but down one.
content.content: Нашему «Кило 1-3» только что дали прикурить! Мы тут несём потери, командир! Мы всё ещё в бою, но потеряли одного.

content.original: Grace under fire folks. Lay it on 'em!
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Grace under fire folks. Lay it on 'em!
content.content: Благодатного огня вам, ребята. Валите их!

content.original: Looks like we have some unexpected support from {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. This is the Primary version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Looks like we have some unexpected support from {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. This is the Primary version.
content.content: Похоже, мы получили неожиданную поддержку от сил {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Name}. Это основная версия.

content.original: Glad we could make it to the party Commander. Our orders are to assist in the Primary Objective and once eliminated head for Evac.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Glad we could make it to the party Commander. Our orders are to assist in the Primary Objective and once eliminated head for Evac.
content.content: Рад, что мы смогли попасть на вечеринку. Наш приказ - оказать содействие в выполнении основной задачи и, как только она будет выполнена, эвакуироваться.

content.original: Copy that lance leader.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Copy that lance leader.
content.content: Понял вас, Лидер-1.

content.original: Copy that lance leader.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER. Copy that lance leader.

content.original: We lost Quebec Two Commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER We lost Quebec Two Commander.

content.original: our employer's ally forces are lost commander.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER our employer's ally forces are lost commander.
content.content: Союзным войскам нашего работодателя пришёл конец, командир.

content.original: Hark {COMMANDER.Name} here are unexpected {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} bad guys are here too. Don't that beat it all. This is the primary objective version.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER, Hark {COMMANDER.Name} here are unexpected {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} bad guys are here too. Don't that beat it all. This is the primary objective version.
content.content: Неожиданно плохие ребята из {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name} тоже здесь. Ну разве это не здорово? Это наша основная цель.

content.original: Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract. If we want to get paid we need to take them out.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract. If we want to get paid we need to take them out.
content.content: Наш работодатель любезно добавил устранение этой группы в контракт. Если мы хотим, чтобы нам заплатили, нужно разобраться с ними.

content.original: Hark {COMMANDER.Name} here are unexpected {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} bad guys  are here too. Don't that beat it all. This is the secondary objective version.

content.original: Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract as a bonus. If we want to make some extra C-bills we can take them out if we want.
content.prevOriginal: PLACEHOLDER Our Employer has kindly added taking this group to contract as a bonus. If we want to make some extra C-bills we can take them out if we want.
content.content: Наш работодатель любезно добавил устранение этой группы в контракт в качестве бонуса. Если мы хотим заработать пару дополнительных C-bills, можно заняться и ими, при желании.

content.original: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to Solaris off-season battle! Let the fight begin!
content.prevOriginal: Ladies and Gentlemen welcome to Solaris off-season battle! Let the fight begin!
content.content: Дамы и господа, добро пожаловать на межсезонную битву Соляриса! Да начнется битва!

content.original: Enemy is straight ahead, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Enemy is straight ahead, Commander.
content.content: Враг прямо по курсу, командир.

content.original: Good hunting, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.prevOriginal: Good hunting, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.content: Доброй охоты, командир. Оливейра конец связи.

content.original: That's all the opponents destroyed, Commander. Well done.
content.prevOriginal: That's all the opponents destroyed, Commander. Well done.
content.content: Это были последние противники, командир. Отличная работа.

content.original: We lost this one, better luck next time, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: We lost this one, better luck next time, Commander.
content.content: Мы проиграли. В следующий раз повезёт, командир.

content.original: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!
content.prevOriginal: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!
content.content: Основная цель получает урон, командир! Продолжайте в том же духе!

content.prevOriginal: Commander, this is a very straightforward match: eliminate all your opposition for the win.

content.original: A customised Behemoth model A of uncertain origin outfitted in rare LosTech, this tank is the property of the Solaris Tank Jockey Scott Mayur. The main guns are replaced with vintage LB-10X Auto-cannons, 4 Streak SRM-2's are mounted in place of the LRM-5's and a pair of LRM-10 racks take the place of the original SRM-6's. These changes are enabled by the new 200 rated Fusion Engine, allegedly salvaged from a downed Enforcer. Where the LosTech came from or who provided the technical assistance needed for the retrofit is unclear. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 2/3 hexes / 60/90 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 370 50 Left 330 50 Right 330 50 Rear 325 50 Turret 370 50 Total 1725 250 Quirk: Main Battle Tank

content.original: Long rumoured to be a representative of the Draconis Combine, Michika Miyazaki's latest refit of her beloved Brutus appear to confirm the rumours. A 225 rated XL Engine - allegedly sourced from a Komodo KIM-2 - and Ferro-Fibrous armour are the centrepiece of the upgrades though the most eye catching is a Clan spec targeting computer linked into the new ER Large Lasers. A pair of the Combines experimental MRM-10's replace the LRM-20 and a Beagle Active Probe rounds out the overhaul. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 3/5 hexes / 90/150 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 190 40 Left 150 40 Right 150 40 Rear 125 40 Turret 150 40 Total 765 200 Quirk: Variable Range Targeting

content.original: Hailing from the Free Rasalhague Republic, Tyra Murchie is often characterised as an eccentric genius. Her latest ride is proof of this. Originally a standard Bulldog MBT, it has been rebuilt around a custom made Fuel Cell engine. Taking advantage of the lighter engine, a Guardian ECM unit was installed and Clan spec Large Pulse Laser replaces the original Large Laser. Where the Laser came from or how Tyra managed to adapt the supposedly incompatible IS and Clan technology remains a mystery. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 4/6 hexes / 120/180 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 140 30 Left 120 30 Right 120 30 Rear 100 30 Turret 120 30 Total 600 150 Quirk: Main Battle Tank

content.original: The Chevalier Light Tank was produced by and for the Star League. The Succession Wars devastated the stores of the Chevalier as the Successor States often cannibalized them for parts. Only Millennium Industries of Terra continued to produce the design, and that was snapped up by ComStar. Though the top speed is only 97 km/h, it is still respectable for a wheeled vehicle. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 6/9 hexes / 180/270 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 140 20 Left 125 20 Right 125 20 Rear 110 20 Turret 120 20 Total 620 100 Quirk: Easy to Pilot

content.original: A relative newcomer to the Solaris scene, Izak Cranworth is a former Mercenary and amateur archaeologist who struck it lucky. Stumbling on to a cache of SLDF spare parts, Izak was able to upgrade his battered Condor. Reskinning the tank in Ferro Fibrous and swapping the ICE for a similar sized 225 Fusion Engine - both sourced from wrecked Nightshade VTOL's - allowed Izak to upgrade the AC/5 to a UAC/5. The Machine Gun is replaced by an Anti Missile System and a pair of Medium Pulse Lasers replace the original Medium Lasers. A recently acquired ClanTech Targeting Computer drastically improves the accuracy of the disparate weapons array. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 8/12 hexes / 240/360 meters. Armor: Heavy Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 170 25 Left 100 25 Right 100 25 Rear 100 25 Turret 140 25 Total 610 125 Quirk: Quick Off The Line

content.original: A familiar face on the Solaris circuits, Daovieng Li is back after an extended absence. A disastrous mishap in her last match resulted in the loss of her Ontos and Li is betting on her new Demolisher to carry her to victory. A modified copy of the standard vehicle, the Demolisher has been rebuilt around a massive ClanTech Targeting Computer; ensuring the feared 155mm ChemJets rarely miss. A custom made Fuel Cell frees up the weight needed for this and a Guardian ECM Suite. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 3/5 hexes / 90/150 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 235 40 Left 190 40 Right 190 40 Rear 150 40 Turret 235 40 Total 1000 200 Quirk: Accurate Weapon - AC

content.original: A former LCAF Tank Driver, James Erskine came to Solaris with a mountain of debt and a mostly intact Drillson MBT. Since then he and his Tank have become a familiar presence on the amateur circuits and it won't be long before he breaks into the bigger leagues. A 215 rated XL Engine -apparently a custom made model - provides room for a Supercharger and an ER Large Laser along with additional armour plating. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 9/14 hexes / 270/420 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 150 25 Left 120 25 Right 120 25 Rear 105 25 Turret 150 25 Total 645 125 Quirk: Accurate Weapon - Laser

content.original: Despite appearances Fayza Mir is not actually a Tank Jockey, instead she's rumoured to be corporate test pilot for Brooks Incorporated. Her Galleon is certainly heavily customised and chock full of unusual modifications. The most unusual of these is a 210 rated XL Engine; apparently acquired from VEST. Paired with this is a Supercharger, capable of pushing the Galleon up to nearly 150kph. Protection is improved with an extra ton of armour plating and the entire tank has been reskinned in Ferro Fibrous plating. A Guardian ECM Suite rounds out the protection while the tanks weapons consist of a Large Laser and 2 Medium Lasers. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 7/11 hexes / 210/330 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 100 15 Left 85 15 Right 85 15 Rear 80 15 Turret 100 15 Total 450 75 Quirk: Protected Mechanisms

content.original: Once a bounty hunter and occasional assassin, Alexander Vlasik has largely retired minus his occasional matches in the mid weight circuits. His Goblin is a feared and respected sight, not least because the bulk of it was assembled from salvage taken from his bounties. The original Goblin chassis came from a pirate band; the XL Engine, AMS and CASE came from a downed PXH-3M and the ER PPC was pulled from the wreckage of a MAD-5D. The only thing not salvaged was the Goblins supercharger which came from a local tech shop. The mishmash of upgrades combine to make the Goblin a fast and mobile sniper with a nasty reputation. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 6/9 hexes / 180/270 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 160 25 Left 130 25 Right 130 25 Rear 115 25 Turret 160 25 Total 695 125 Quirk: Variable Range Targeting

content.original: Possibly insane and certainly eccentric, Johana Nyemba is the highest profile Hetzer Jockey on Solaris. Usually appearing in the mixed Leagues, this is her first appearance fighting solo. Built for one hit kills, her Hetzer features a Gauss Rifle in place of the traditional Autocannon. A custom made Fuel Cell pushes the Hetzer to speeds in excess of 80 kph and provides the space for the massive Gauss Rifle and it's ammo. A Guardian ECM unit helps the Hetzer to reposition between shots and provides some protection at range. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 5/8 hexes / 150/240 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 170 20 Left 130 20 Right 130 20 Rear 130 20 Total 560 80 Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile

content.original: Not much is known about Frantz Moore but one thing is for certain; he has serious connections. Experimental DCMS tech doesn't just fall off any old dropship after all. Somewhat unusually for a Hunter driver, he favours close combat and has equipped his Hunter with a supercharger and an MRM-30 with 3 tons of ammo. An XL Engine allows the addition of 2 tons of armour; making for a potent ambusher. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 5/8 hexes / 150/240 meters. content.original: Mysterious and uncertain pasts are par for the course on Solaris, but Cait's is stranger then most. Most stories claims she defected from a Clan or was captured in combat. Whatever the case, she is an unusual contender on the arena circuits with a customized J. Edgar believed to date from the first Star League. Fully upgraded with ClanTech, the J. Edgar uses a combination of an XL Engine and Ferro Fibrous to free up the weight needed to upgrade the SRM-2's to Clan Streak 4's. The Medium Laser is swapped for a Clan ER model and the armour protection is improved by a ton. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 11/17 hexes / 330/510 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 160 15 Left 110 15 Right 110 15 Rear 80 15 Turret 140 15 Total 600 75 Quirk: Accurate Weapon - Laser

content.original: Kyle MacGlashan is very coy about the origins of his Kanga, a tank which is theoretically extinct. That doesn't stop the museum piece from being any less dangerous with 8 wins already racked up this year. Outfitted for CQC, Kyle's Kanga is significantly modified compared to the original model. A swap to a Fuel Cell enables the main gun to be upgraded for an LB-10X model. Likewise the missile racks are swapped for a pair of Streak SRM-2's and a Small Laser takes the place of the Machine Gun. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 8/12 hexes / 240/360 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 150 25 Left 110 25 Right 110 25 Rear 110 25 Total 480 100 Quirk: Protected Mechanisms

content.original: A former pro racer Elfi Melsom has taken to high speed duelling with a dramatic flair. Working with an unknown patron, Elfi has recently adjured a small fortune in ClanTech. Her Lightning is an original spec model of uncertain provenance with extensive modifications. The most dramatic of which are the XL Engine recently claimed as salvage in a duel with a Nighthawk NTK-2Q. The free weight from this allowed Elfi to double her rides protection with 7.5 tons of Ferro Fibrous compared to the original 3.5. The cache of ClanTech has come in handy with a Targeting Computer augmenting the Medium Pulse Lasers and Streak SRM-4's replacing the one shot launchers. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 11/17 hexes / 330/510 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 200 20 Left 170 20 Right 170 20 Rear 150 20 Total 690 80 Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile

content.original: The vehicle simply known as the 'Hover Tank' was originally developed by Lucas Technologies as a bid to gain a military contract for the Terran Hegemony's Armed forces. After years of development and proposals, the result their efforts would be the LTV-4 Hover Tank in 2464. The LTV series was the response as part of an effort to counter proliferation of BattleMech technologies stolen from the Hegemony. The vehicle was designed to swarm these early BattleMechs in groups and use their combined firepower to hold them until other forces could close and eliminate them. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 7/11 hexes / 210/330 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 150 25 Left 120 25 Right 120 25 Rear 100 25 Turret 100 25 Total 590 125 Quirk: Improved Targeting - Short

content.original: The Marsden II Main Battle Tank was introduced by Arcturan Arms in 2463 to replace its venerable predecessor after seventy years of frontline service. Improved technical and manufacturing knowledge allowed the company to improve the new tank's arms and armor while still making it five tons lighter. With its excellent firepower and thick armor, it was considered a cutting edge combat vehicle when it premiered during the Age of War. The durable Marsden II continued to soldier on in various planetary militias and private security force arsenals into the Succession Wars. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 4/6 hexes / 120/180 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 270 30 Left 260 30 Right 260 30 Rear 205 30 Turret 255 30 Total 1250 150 Quirk: Main Battle Tank

content.original: A native of Solaris, Natalie Curwen was at one point a rising star in the planetary militia until her career was cut short amid unproven rumours of corruption and selling classified intelligence. Since being booted out, she has slowly worked her way through the various minor leagues while dealing in information and - allegedly - black market weapons. Driving a customised Palisade MBT acquired during her militia service, Curwen has some how secured a Clan LRM-20 augmented with Artemis IV and steady supply of ammo to go with it. Installed on her tank in place of the original LRM-15; the free weight created has been used to upgrade the Machine Gun to an AMS and add CASE to the magazines. Ferro Fibrous was used to improve the Tanks armour, particularly on the weaker flank and rear armour. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 4/6 hexes / 120/180 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 270 30 Left 210 30 Right 210 30 Rear 200 30 Turret 210 30 Total 1100 150 Quirk: Main Battle Tank

content.original: Not a common site in the arenas; the Partisan is slow, undergunned and poorly armoured. The Partisan piloted by Ka-Lai Guo is not. Armed with paired AC/5's and Clan made UAC/5's - the accuracy of which is ensured by a massive Clan Targeting Computer - Ka-Lai's Partisan can shred most foes before they get close. Mixing the weapons systems minimises the risk of a crippling jam knocking all the weapons out and allows for non standard ammo to be loaded in the AC/5's. A Fuel Cell is used to boost the Tanks armour to more survivable levels. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 3/5 hexes / 90/150 meters. Armor: Heavy Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 160 40 Left 140 40 Right 140 40 Rear 120 40 Turret 160 40 Total 720 200 Quirk: Anti-Air Targeting

content.original: The Pike was created at the direction of Magestrix Kyalla Centrella of the Magistracy of Canopus during the later part of the Third Succession War. Her plan was to produce an inexpensive combat vehicle so the Great Houses would wear down their BattleMech armies through attrition, and the Pike would be the tool she envisioned for the task. However, sending vehicles to market in the Inner Sphere was to be more costly than anticipated. With the Great Houses' shrinking numbers of ships in their JumpShip fleets, the vehicle did not make the impact she had hoped it would. It became a favorite of ComStar's growing garrison forces for their HPG complexes. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 3/5 hexes / 90/150 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 210 30 Left 190 30 Right 190 30 Rear 170 30 Turret 210 30 Total 970 150 Quirk: Accurate Weapon - Missiles

content.original: While often derided as a poor man's Rommel/Patton tank, the simply constructed and dependable Po Heavy Tank, named by Romano Liao for the mischievous and vengeful spirit of Chinese tradition, has become the principal combat vehicle on Capellan worlds lacking 'Mech units. Introduced in 3031, the Po is built around the rugged, dependable, and cheap Ceres 240 internal combustion engine, which gives the tank a maximum flank speed of 65 kph. Ten and half tons of armor provides respectable protection for a heavy tank. Along with its ease of maintenance and decent firepower, this protection has made the Po a popular choice among cash strapped mercenaries, lower ranked garrison units, the Free Worlds League and Word of Blake, with such export sales keeping much needed funds flowing into the Confederation's coffers. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 4/6 hexes / 120/180 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 200 30 Left 180 30 Right 180 30 Rear 160 30 Turret 200 30 Total 920 150 Quirk: Main Battle Tank
content.prevOriginal: While often derided as a poor man's Rommel/Patton tank, the simply constructed and dependable Po Heavy Tank, named by Romano Liao for the mischievous and vengeful spirit of Chinese tradition, has become the principal combat vehicle on Capellan worlds lacking 'Mech units. Introduced in 3031, the Po is built around the rugged, dependable, and cheap Ceres 240 internal combustion engine, which gives the tank a maximum flank speed of 65 kph. Ten and half tons of armor provides respectable protection for a heavy tank. Along with its ease of maintenance and decent firepower, this protection has made the Po a popular choice among cash strapped mercenaries, lower ranked garrison units, the Free Worlds League and Word of Blake, with such export sales keeping much needed funds flowing into the Confederation's coffers. Fusion: Expensive engine that works in a Vacuum. Movement: 4/6 Hex: 120/180 Meters. content.original: Not many people can say they won a tank in a legal dispute, but Rafael Lopez managed to. Caught up in a business dispute with some partners, the engineer found himself stuck with a Puma assault tank he didn't need or want. Initially entering the minor leagues as a hobby, he eventually switched professions and now drives his customised Puma fulltime. Lightly modified compared to some tanks, his Puma has had the standard 285 Fusion Engine upgraded to an XL model. With the newly free weight, the PPC has been upgraded to an ER model and the SRM and LRM launchers augmented with Artemis IV. A light covering of Ferro Fibrous plating improves the Tanks armour. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 3/5 hexes / 90/150 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 280 50 Left 200 50 Right 200 50 Rear 140 50 Turret 280 50 Total 1100 250 Quirk: Main Battle Tank

content.original: Traditionally used as a fire support vehicle and kept far back from the action, the Rhino is usually a slow and fairly defenceless tank at close range. Aaron McMinn's is not. The former LCAF Tank commander spared no expense in the outfighting of his. The standard 240 rated Fusion Engine has been ripped out and replaced by a massive 320 rated XL Engine. A Supercharger further augments the Rhinos speed; with a top speed of over 80 kph, the Rhino can often outrun lighter opponents. Close in defences have been augmented with a pair of Medium Pulse Lasers and the LRM's exchanged for Clan equivalents with Artemis IV systems installed. Lastly, the Rhino is replated in Ferro Fibrous, considerably improving the vehicles armour. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 4/6 hexes / 120/180 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 350 40 Left 290 40 Right 290 40 Rear 225 40 Turret 310 40 Total 1465 200 Quirk: Improved Targeting - Long

content.original: The Rommel tank is a 65-ton armored combat vehicle, specializing in close range fighting and urban combat. Identical to its twin, the Patton, in every way but armament and armor configuration, the Rommel has primarily served with the Lyran Commonwealth and the Lyran Alliance. It is named after Field Marshal Erwin Rommel, a legendary commander of armored and mechanized forces renowned for his exploits during World War II on Terra. The Rommel was designed concurrently with the Patton in the early 3000s, when Defiance Industries decided that an armored combat vehicle capable of replacing 'Mechs was needed. Since 'Mech production was nearly at a standstill, the ability to produce and field armored vehicles became a necessity for every Successor State. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 4/6 hexes / 120/180 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 220 35 Left 200 35 Right 200 35 Rear 150 35 Turret 220 35 Total 990 175 Quirk: Main Battle Tank

content.original: Sporting an unusual main weapon, Bernd Skorstad's Saladin Hover Tank also sports a custom built 105 rated Fusion Engine instead of the typical ICE engine. The reason for this minor novelty is the Binary Laser mounted in place of the standard Autocannon. Originating in a DCMS refit program long since abandoned and forgotten, Skorstad's Saladin hits almost as hard as a standard model and at nearly twice the range to boot. Installed recently, Ferro Fibrous plating improves armour protection; essential for the sort of matches Skorstad finds himself in. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 9/14 hexes / 270/420 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 100 20 Left 80 20 Right 80 20 Rear 75 20 Total 335 80 Quirk: Rugged

content.original: Commanding the Scorpion Light Tank nicknamed Invincible, Olympia Capraru is on the 4th iteration of that name in 6 years; the previous models being lost in combat. This time around she publicly made a vow to not lose another Scorpion of that name and has contracted a smuggler making runs out of the Clan Occupation Zones to bring her stolen tech to augment the tank with. Currently aping the original SRM spec Scorpion, her Invincible has been extensively upgraded. The original SRM racks are long gone with a pair of Clan Streak SRM-6's installed in their place. The Machine Gun is swapped for an AMS. A Guardian ECM Suite rounds out the new loadout while a combination of a Fuel Cell and Ferro Fibrous bump the armour by a ton and allow CASE'd magazines for the ammo. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 4/6 hexes / 120/180 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 110 15 Left 90 15 Right 90 15 Rear 70 15 Turret 100 15 Total 460 75 Quirk: Protected Mechanisms

content.original: Iwao Kogawa is a former DCMS test pilot turned mercenary turned Solaris Jockey. His Vedette is all that remains of the abandoned program to outfight conventual units with Blazers. Needed to manage the power demands and waste heat of the Blazer, the Vedettes 250 rated ICE has been swapped for a Fusion Engine taken from a damaged Trebuchet. After market modifications made since Kogawa turned Merc include swapping the Machine Gun with an AMS and reskinning the Vedette in Ferro Fibrous. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 5/8 hexes / 150/240 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 120 25 Left 100 25 Right 100 25 Rear 120 25 Turret 120 25 Total 560 125 Quirk: Quick Off The Line

content.original: In 3030, Aldis Industries deployed the successful follow up to its venerable Demolisher design, the slightly lighter Zhukov. While it shares many of the parts and features of the design that inspired it, the Zhukov is smaller, better armored, and packs less weaponry than its predecessor. Its first major deployment was with the Wolf's Dragoons whereupon the Zhukov has since seen constant improvements and tweaks as suggested to Aldis Industries by the field units that use it. The Zhukov's strength is its relative simplicity. Two turret mounted SarLon MaxiCannon Autocannon/10s are more than adequate at providing sufficient firepower for the discriminating buyer while imitating its larger cousin the Demolisher. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 3/5 hexes / 90/150 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 250 40 Left 190 40 Right 190 40 Rear 150 40 Turret 250 40 Total 1030 200 Quirk: Main Battle Tank

content.original: The 3M Griffin was an upgraded version of the design built for House Marik by Earthwerks and Brigadier Corps starting in 3049. With production lines on Keystone and Oliver this variant sought to enhance the original's long-range capabilities. The engine was exchanged for a Hermes 275 extralight model and carried fourteen double heat sinks to improve heat management. The normal PPC was replaced by a Fusigon Longtooth ER PPC, for longer reach at the expense of more heat, and the LRM launcher had been upgraded to a Doombud LRM-20 launcher, for more indirect fire support capabilities. Finally a ChrisComp Small Laser was mounted in the head and the two tons of LRM reloads in the left torso were protected by CASE. While intended for the Free Worlds League Military the capture of Oliver by FedCom forces meant the 3M also appeared in large numbers in the Armed Forces of the Federated Commonwealth. Quirk: Battle Fists Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.05

Finally a ChrisComp Small Laser was mounted in the head and the two tons of LRM reloads in the left torso were protected by CASE. While intended for the Free Worlds League Military the capture of Oliver by FedCom forces meant the 3M also appeared in large numbers in the Armed Forces of the Federated Commonwealth.
content.content: The 3M Griffin was an upgraded version of the design built for House Marik by Earthwerks and Brigadier Corps starting in 3049. With production lines on Keystone and Oliver this variant sought to enhance the original's long-range capabilities. The engine was exchanged for a Hermes 275 extralight model and carried fourteen double heat sinks to improve heat management. The normal PPC was replaced by a Fusigon Longtooth ER PPC, for longer reach at the expense of more heat, and the LRM launcher had been upgraded to a Doombud LRM-20 launcher, for more indirect fire support capabilities. Finally a ChrisComp Small Laser was mounted in the head and the two tons of LRM reloads in the left torso were protected by CASE. While intended for the Free Worlds League Military the capture of Oliver by FedCom forces meant the 3M also appeared in large numbers in the Armed Forces of the Federated Commonwealth.

content.original: One of the first mass production QuadMechs, the 55 ton Scorpion entered production in 2570 as an infantry support unit. Shunned by most MechWarriors due to it's notoriously unstable gait, the Scorpion would nevertheless see uninterrupted use throughout the Succession Wars and beyond. The Scorpion 1N is powered by a 330 rated Fusion Core giving it a top speed of 97km/h. A PPC and an SRM-6 form the Mechs weapons load. Quirk: Improved Lifesupport Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.03

content.original: A customised Behemoth model A of uncertain origin outfitted in rare LosTech, this tank is the property of the Solaris Tank Jockey Scott Mayur. The main guns are replaced with vintage LB-10X Auto-cannons, 4 Streak SRM-2's are mounted in place of the LRM-5's and a pair of LRM-10 racks take the place of the original SRM-6's. These changes are enabled by the new 200 rated Fusion Engine, allegedly salvaged from a downed Enforcer. Where the LosTech came from or who provided the technical assistance needed for the retrofit is unclear. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 2/3 hexes / 60/90 meters. content.original: Long rumoured to be a representative of the Draconis Combine, Michika Miyazaki's latest refit of her beloved Brutus appear to confirm the rumours. A 225 rated XL Engine - allegedly sourced from a Komodo KIM-2 - and Ferro-Fibrous armour are the centrepiece of the upgrades though the most eye catching is a Clan spec targeting computer linked into the new ER Large Lasers. A pair of the Combines experimental MRM-10's replace the LRM-20 and a Beagle Active Probe rounds out the overhaul. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 3/5 hexes / 90/150 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 190 40 Left 150 40 Right 150 40 Rear 125 40 Turret 150 40 Total 765 200 Quirk: Variable Range Targeting

content.original: Hailing from the Free Rasalhague Republic, Tyra Murchie is often characterised as an eccentric genius. Her latest ride is proof of this. Originally a standard Bulldog MBT, it has been rebuilt around a custom made Fuel Cell engine. Taking advantage of the lighter engine, a Guardian ECM unit was installed and Clan spec Large Pulse Laser replaces the original Large Laser. Where the Laser came from or how Tyra managed to adapt the supposedly incompatible IS and Clan technology remains a mystery. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 4/6 hexes / 120/180 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 140 30 Left 120 30 Right 120 30 Rear 100 30 Turret 120 30 Total 600 150 Quirk: Main Battle Tank

content.original: The Chevalier Light Tank was produced by and for the Star League. The Succession Wars devastated the stores of the Chevalier as the Successor States often cannibalized them for parts. Only Millennium Industries of Terra continued to produce the design, and that was snapped up by ComStar. Though the top speed is only 97 km/h, it is still respectable for a wheeled vehicle. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 6/9 hexes / 180/270 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 140 20 Left 125 20 Right 125 20 Rear 110 20 Turret 120 20 Total 620 100 Quirk: Easy to Pilot

content.original: A relative newcomer to the Solaris scene, Izak Cranworth is a former Mercenary and amateur archaeologist who struck it lucky. Stumbling on to a cache of SLDF spare parts, Izak was able to upgrade his battered Condor. Reskinning the tank in Ferro Fibrous and swapping the ICE for a similar sized 225 Fusion Engine - both sourced from wrecked Nightshade VTOL's - allowed Izak to upgrade the AC/5 to a UAC/5. The Machine Gun is replaced by an Anti Missile System and a pair of Medium Pulse Lasers replace the original Medium Lasers. A recently acquired ClanTech Targeting Computer drastically improves the accuracy of the disparate weapons array. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 8/12 hexes / 240/360 meters. Armor: Heavy Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 170 25 Left 100 25 Right 100 25 Rear 100 25 Turret 140 25 Total 610 125 Quirk: Quick Off The Line

content.original: A familiar face on the Solaris circuits, Daovieng Li is back after an extended absence. A disastrous mishap in her last match resulted in the loss of her Ontos and Li is betting on her new Demolisher to carry her to victory. A modified copy of the standard vehicle, the Demolisher has been rebuilt around a massive ClanTech Targeting Computer; ensuring the feared 155mm ChemJets rarely miss. A custom made Fuel Cell frees up the weight needed for this and a Guardian ECM Suite. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 3/5 hexes / 90/150 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 235 40 Left 190 40 Right 190 40 Rear 150 40 Turret 235 40 Total 1000 200 Quirk: Accurate Weapon - AC

content.original: A former LCAF Tank Driver, James Erskine came to Solaris with a mountain of debt and a mostly intact Drillson MBT. Since then he and his Tank have become a familiar presence on the amateur circuits and it won't be long before he breaks into the bigger leagues. A 215 rated XL Engine -apparently a custom made model - provides room for a Supercharger and an ER Large Laser along with additional armour plating. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 9/14 hexes / 270/420 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 150 25 Left 120 25 Right 120 25 Rear 105 25 Turret 150 25 Total 645 125 Quirk: Accurate Weapon - Laser

content.original: Despite appearances Fayza Mir is not actually a Tank Jockey, instead she's rumoured to be corporate test pilot for Brooks Incorporated. Her Galleon is certainly heavily customised and chock full of unusual modifications. The most unusual of these is a 210 rated XL Engine; apparently acquired from VEST. Paired with this is a Supercharger, capable of pushing the Galleon up to nearly 150kph. Protection is improved with an extra ton of armour plating and the entire tank has been reskinned in Ferro Fibrous plating. A Guardian ECM Suite rounds out the protection while the tanks weapons consist of a Large Laser and 2 Medium Lasers. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 7/11 hexes / 210/330 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 100 15 Left 85 15 Right 85 15 Rear 80 15 Turret 100 15 Total 450 75 Quirk: Protected Mechanisms

content.original: Once a bounty hunter and occasional assassin, Alexander Vlasik has largely retired minus his occasional matches in the mid weight circuits. His Goblin is a feared and respected sight, not least because the bulk of it was assembled from salvage taken from his bounties. The original Goblin chassis came from a pirate band; the XL Engine, AMS and CASE came from a downed PXH-3M and the ER PPC was pulled from the wreckage of a MAD-5D. The only thing not salvaged was the Goblins supercharger which came from a local tech shop. The mishmash of upgrades combine to make the Goblin a fast and mobile sniper with a nasty reputation. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 6/9 hexes / 180/270 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 160 25 Left 130 25 Right 130 25 Rear 115 25 Turret 160 25 Total 695 125 Quirk: Variable Range Targeting

content.original: Possibly insane and certainly eccentric, Johana Nyemba is the highest profile Hetzer Jockey on Solaris. Usually appearing in the mixed Leagues, this is her first appearance fighting solo. Built for one hit kills, her Hetzer features a Gauss Rifle in place of the traditional Autocannon. A custom made Fuel Cell pushes the Hetzer to speeds in excess of 80 kph and provides the space for the massive Gauss Rifle and it's ammo. A Guardian ECM unit helps the Hetzer to reposition between shots and provides some protection at range. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 5/8 hexes / 150/240 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 170 20 Left 130 20 Right 130 20 Rear 130 20 Total 560 80 Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile

content.original: Not much is known about Frantz Moore but one thing is for certain; he has serious connections. Experimental DCMS tech doesn't just fall off any old dropship after all. Somewhat unusually for a Hunter driver, he favours close combat and has equipped his Hunter with a supercharger and an MRM-30 with 3 tons of ammo. An XL Engine allows the addition of 2 tons of armour; making for a potent ambusher. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 5/8 hexes / 150/240 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 260 20 Left 160 20 Right 160 20 Rear 100 20 Total 680 80 Quirk: Accurate Weapon - Missiles

An XL Engine allows the addition of 2 tons of armour; making for a potent ambusher. Ограничения биома: нет. Передвижение: 5/8 hexes / 150/240 meters. content.original: Mysterious and uncertain pasts are par for the course on Solaris, but Cait's is stranger then most. Most stories claims she defected from a Clan or was captured in combat. Whatever the case, she is an unusual contender on the arena circuits with a customized J. Edgar believed to date from the first Star League. Fully upgraded with ClanTech, the J. Edgar uses a combination of an XL Engine and Ferro Fibrous to free up the weight needed to upgrade the SRM-2's to Clan Streak 4's. The Medium Laser is swapped for a Clan ER model and the armour protection is improved by a ton. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 11/17 hexes / 330/510 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 160 15 Left 110 15 Right 110 15 Rear 80 15 Turret 140 15 Total 600 75 Quirk: Accurate Weapon - Laser

content.original: Kyle MacGlashan is very coy about the origins of his Kanga, a tank which is theoretically extinct. That doesn't stop the museum piece from being any less dangerous with 8 wins already racked up this year. Outfitted for CQC, Kyle's Kanga is significantly modified compared to the original model. A swap to a Fuel Cell enables the main gun to be upgraded for an LB-10X model. Likewise the missile racks are swapped for a pair of Streak SRM-2's and a Small Laser takes the place of the Machine Gun. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 8/12 hexes / 240/360 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 150 25 Left 110 25 Right 110 25 Rear 110 25 Total 480 100 Quirk: Protected Mechanisms

content.original: A former pro racer Elfi Melsom has taken to high speed duelling with a dramatic flair. Working with an unknown patron, Elfi has recently adjured a small fortune in ClanTech. Her Lightning is an original spec model of uncertain provenance with extensive modifications. The most dramatic of which are the XL Engine recently claimed as salvage in a duel with a Nighthawk NTK-2Q. The free weight from this allowed Elfi to double her rides protection with 7.5 tons of Ferro Fibrous compared to the original 3.5. The cache of ClanTech has come in handy with a Targeting Computer augmenting the Medium Pulse Lasers and Streak SRM-4's replacing the one shot launchers. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 11/17 hexes / 330/510 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 200 20 Left 170 20 Right 170 20 Rear 150 20 Total 690 80 Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile

content.original: The vehicle simply known as the 'Hover Tank' was originally developed by Lucas Technologies as a bid to gain a military contract for the Terran Hegemony's Armed forces. After years of development and proposals, the result their efforts would be the LTV-4 Hover Tank in 2464. The LTV series was the response as part of an effort to counter proliferation of BattleMech technologies stolen from the Hegemony. The vehicle was designed to swarm these early BattleMechs in groups and use their combined firepower to hold them until other forces could close and eliminate them. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 7/11 hexes / 210/330 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 150 25 Left 120 25 Right 120 25 Rear 100 25 Turret 100 25 Total 590 125 Quirk: Improved Targeting - Short

content.original: The Marsden II Main Battle Tank was introduced by Arcturan Arms in 2463 to replace its venerable predecessor after seventy years of frontline service. Improved technical and manufacturing knowledge allowed the company to improve the new tank's arms and armor while still making it five tons lighter. With its excellent firepower and thick armor, it was considered a cutting edge combat vehicle when it premiered during the Age of War. The durable Marsden II continued to soldier on in various planetary militias and private security force arsenals into the Succession Wars. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 4/6 hexes / 120/180 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 270 30 Left 260 30 Right 260 30 Rear 205 30 Turret 255 30 Total 1250 150 Quirk: Main Battle Tank

content.original: A native of Solaris, Natalie Curwen was at one point a rising star in the planetary militia until her career was cut short amid unproven rumours of corruption and selling classified intelligence. Since being booted out, she has slowly worked her way through the various minor leagues while dealing in information and - allegedly - black market weapons. Driving a customised Palisade MBT acquired during her militia service, Curwen has some how secured a Clan LRM-20 augmented with Artemis IV and steady supply of ammo to go with it. Installed on her tank in place of the original LRM-15; the free weight created has been used to upgrade the Machine Gun to an AMS and add CASE to the magazines. Ferro Fibrous was used to improve the Tanks armour, particularly on the weaker flank and rear armour. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 4/6 hexes / 120/180 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 270 30 Left 210 30 Right 210 30 Rear 200 30 Turret 210 30 Total 1100 150 Quirk: Main Battle Tank

content.original: Not a common site in the arenas; the Partisan is slow, undergunned and poorly armoured. The Partisan piloted by Ka-Lai Guo is not. Armed with paired AC/5's and Clan made UAC/5's - the accuracy of which is ensured by a massive Clan Targeting Computer - Ka-Lai's Partisan can shred most foes before they get close. Mixing the weapons systems minimises the risk of a crippling jam knocking all the weapons out and allows for non standard ammo to be loaded in the AC/5's. A Fuel Cell is used to boost the Tanks armour to more survivable levels. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 3/5 hexes / 90/150 meters. Armor: Heavy Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 160 40 Left 140 40 Right 140 40 Rear 120 40 Turret 160 40 Total 720 200 Quirk: Anti-Air Targeting

content.original: The Pike was created at the direction of Magestrix Kyalla Centrella of the Magistracy of Canopus during the later part of the Third Succession War. Her plan was to produce an inexpensive combat vehicle so the Great Houses would wear down their BattleMech armies through attrition, and the Pike would be the tool she envisioned for the task. However, sending vehicles to market in the Inner Sphere was to be more costly than anticipated. With the Great Houses' shrinking numbers of ships in their JumpShip fleets, the vehicle did not make the impact she had hoped it would. It became a favorite of ComStar's growing garrison forces for their HPG complexes. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 3/5 hexes / 90/150 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 210 30 Left 190 30 Right 190 30 Rear 170 30 Turret 210 30 Total 970 150 Quirk: Accurate Weapon - Missiles

content.original: While often derided as a poor man's Rommel/Patton tank, the simply constructed and dependable Po Heavy Tank, named by Romano Liao for the mischievous and vengeful spirit of Chinese tradition, has become the principal combat vehicle on Capellan worlds lacking 'Mech units. Introduced in 3031, the Po is built around the rugged, dependable, and cheap Ceres 240 internal combustion engine, which gives the tank a maximum flank speed of 65 kph. Ten and half tons of armor provides respectable protection for a heavy tank. Along with its ease of maintenance and decent firepower, this protection has made the Po a popular choice among cash strapped mercenaries, lower ranked garrison units, the Free Worlds League and Word of Blake, with such export sales keeping much needed funds flowing into the Confederation's coffers. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 4/6 hexes / 120/180 meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 200 30 Left 180 30 Right 180 30 Rear 160 30 Turret 200 30 Total 920 150 Quirk: Main Battle Tank

content.original: Not many people can say they won a tank in a legal dispute, but Rafael Lopez managed to. Caught up in a business dispute with some partners, the engineer found himself stuck with a Puma assault tank he didn't need or want. Initially entering the minor leagues as a hobby, he eventually switched professions and now drives his customised Puma fulltime. Lightly modified compared to some tanks, his Puma has had the standard 285 Fusion Engine upgraded to an XL model. With the newly free weight, the PPC has been upgraded to an ER model and the SRM and LRM launchers augmented with Artemis IV. A light covering of Ferro Fibrous plating improves the Tanks armour. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 3/5 hexes / 90/150 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 280 50 Left 200 50 Right 200 50 Rear 140 50 Turret 280 50 Total 1100 250 Quirk: Main Battle Tank

content.original: Traditionally used as a fire support vehicle and kept far back from the action, the Rhino is usually a slow and fairly defenceless tank at close range. Aaron McMinn's is not. The former LCAF Tank commander spared no expense in the outfighting of his. The standard 240 rated Fusion Engine has been ripped out and replaced by a massive 320 rated XL Engine. A Supercharger further augments the Rhinos speed; with a top speed of over 80 kph, the Rhino can often outrun lighter opponents. Close in defences have been augmented with a pair of Medium Pulse Lasers and the LRM's exchanged for Clan equivalents with Artemis IV systems installed. Lastly, the Rhino is replated in Ferro Fibrous, considerably improving the vehicles armour. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 4/6 hexes / 120/180 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 350 40 Left 290 40 Right 290 40 Rear 225 40 Turret 310 40 Total 1465 200 Quirk: Improved Targeting - Long
content.prevOriginal: Traditionally used as a fire support vehicle and kept far back from the action, the Rhino is usually a slow and fairly defenceless tank at close range. Aaron McMinn's is not. The former LCAF Tank commander spared no expense in the outfighting of his. The standard 240 rated Fusion Engine has been ripped out and replaced by a massive 320 rated XL Engine. A Supercharger further augments the Rhinos speed; with a top speed of over 80 kph, the Rhino can often outrun lighter opponents. Close in defences have been augmented with a pair of Medium Pulse Lasers and the LRM's exchanged for Clan equivalents with Artemis IV systems installed. Lastly, the Rhino is replated in Ferro Fibrous, considerably improving the vehicles armour. Fusion: Expensive engine that works in a Vacuum. Movement: 4/6 Hex: 120/180 Meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 350 40 Left 290 40 Right 290 40 Rear 225 40 Turret 310 40 Total 1465 200 Quirk: Improved Targeting - Long

content.original: The Rommel tank is a 65-ton armored combat vehicle, specializing in close range fighting and urban combat. Identical to its twin, the Patton, in every way but armament and armor configuration, the Rommel has primarily served with the Lyran Commonwealth and the Lyran Alliance. It is named after Field Marshal Erwin Rommel, a legendary commander of armored and mechanized forces renowned for his exploits during World War II on Terra. The Rommel was designed concurrently with the Patton in the early 3000s, when Defiance Industries decided that an armored combat vehicle capable of replacing 'Mechs was needed. Since 'Mech production was nearly at a standstill, the ability to produce and field armored vehicles became a necessity for every Successor State. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 4/6 hexes / 120/180 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 220 35 Left 200 35 Right 200 35 Rear 150 35 Turret 220 35 Total 990 175 Quirk: Main Battle Tank

content.original: Sporting an unusual main weapon, Bernd Skorstad's Saladin Hover Tank also sports a custom built 105 rated Fusion Engine instead of the typical ICE engine. The reason for this minor novelty is the Binary Laser mounted in place of the standard Autocannon. Originating in a DCMS refit program long since abandoned and forgotten, Skorstad's Saladin hits almost as hard as a standard model and at nearly twice the range to boot. Installed recently, Ferro Fibrous plating improves armour protection; essential for the sort of matches Skorstad finds himself in. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 9/14 hexes / 270/420 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 100 20 Left 80 20 Right 80 20 Rear 75 20 Total 335 80 Quirk: Rugged
